11844009Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void diskLess()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(ms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine("HELLO!");Di2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine("I WANT TO SAVE THIS FILE AS A .TXT FILE WITHIN TWO FOLDERS");Di2015NewLine            sw.Flush(); 11844484Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This is where we wish to print our stringDi2015NewLine    var region = new RectangleF(50, 50, 200, 50);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is the font we wish to useDi2015NewLine    var font = new Font("Times New Roman", 16.0F);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw a string for comparisonDi2015NewLine    DrawString(e.Graphics, "RedBlack", font, Brushes.Black, new RectangleF(50, 150, 200, 50));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the first string and keep a track of the Region it was rendered inDi2015NewLine    var first = DrawString(e.Graphics, "Red", font, Brushes.Red, region);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Adjust the region we wish to print Di2015NewLine    region = new RectangleF(region.X + first.GetBounds(e.Graphics).Width, region.Y, region.Width, region.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the second stringDi2015NewLine    DrawString(e.Graphics, "Black", font, Brushes.Black, region);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Region DrawString(Graphics g, string s, Font font, Brush brush, RectangleF layoutRectangle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var format = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine    format.SetMeasurableCharacterRanges(new[] { new CharacterRange(0, s.Length) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    g.DrawString(s, font, brush, layoutRectangle, format);Di2015NewLine    return g.MeasureCharacterRanges(s, font, layoutRectangle, format)[0];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11847187Di2015UniqueSeparator// The parameter [number] will NEVER be negative.Di2015NewLinepublic static bool ConformsToPattern (System.Numerics.BigInteger number)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte [] bytes = null;Di2015NewLine    bool moreOnesPossible = true;Di2015NewLine    bool foundFirstOne = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (number == 0) // 00000000Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (true); // All bits are zero.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bytes = number.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((bytes [bytes.Length - 1] & 1) == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (byte b=0; b < bytes.Length; b++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (moreOnesPossible)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if(!foundFirstOne)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ifDi2015NewLine                        (Di2015NewLine                            (bytes [b] == 1) // 00000001Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 3) // 00000011Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 7) // 00000111Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 15) // 00001111Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 31) // 00011111Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 63) // 00111111Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 127) // 01111111Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 255) // 11111111Di2015NewLine                        )Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            foundFirstOne = true;Di2015NewLine                            // So far so good. Continue to the next byte withDi2015NewLine                            // a possibility of more consecutive 1s.Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else ifDi2015NewLine                        (Di2015NewLine                            (bytes [b] == 128) // 10000000Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 192) // 11000000Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 224) // 11100000Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 240) // 11110000Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 248) // 11111000Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 252) // 11111100Di2015NewLine                            || (bytes [b] == 254) // 11111110Di2015NewLine                        )Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            moreOnesPossible = false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            return (false);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if(bytes [b] != 255) // 11111111Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ifDi2015NewLine                            (Di2015NewLine                                (bytes [b] == 128) // 10000000Di2015NewLine                                || (bytes [b] == 192) // 11000000Di2015NewLine                                    || (bytes [b] == 224) // 11100000Di2015NewLine                                || (bytes [b] == 240) // 11110000Di2015NewLine                                || (bytes [b] == 248) // 11111000Di2015NewLine                                || (bytes [b] == 252) // 11111100Di2015NewLine                                || (bytes [b] == 254) // 11111110Di2015NewLine                            )Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                moreOnesPossible = false;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }                            Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (bytes [b] > 11850246Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ViewModel : INotifyPropertyChanged {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<Item> PagedItems {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    private DispatcherTimer _timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ObservableCollection<Item> _itemsToPage;Di2015NewLine    private int _itemsPerPage;Di2015NewLine    private int _currentPage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ViewModel() {Di2015NewLine        _itemsToPage = new ObservableCollection<Item>(); // replace this with whatever your items areDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _timer = new DispatcherTimer {Interval = new TimeSpan(0,0,0,10)};Di2015NewLine        _timer.Tick += NextPage;Di2015NewLine        _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void NextPage(object sender, object e) {Di2015NewLine        if (_itemsToPage < _itemsPerPage) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_currentPage * _itemsPerPage >= _itemsToPage) _currentPage = 1;Di2015NewLine        else _currentPage++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the key lineDi2015NewLine        PagedItems = new ObservableCollection<Item>(Di2015NewLine            _itemsToPage.Skip((_currentPage-1) * _itemsPerPage)Di2015NewLine                .Take(_itemsPerPage));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OnPropertyChanged("PagedItems") // you need to implement INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11852448Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<int> GetAscending(IEnumerable<int> input, int startIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ascending = input.Skip(startIndex)Di2015NewLine        .Zip(input.Skip(startIndex + 1), (first, second) => new { Num = first, Next = second, Diff = second - first })Di2015NewLine        .SkipWhile(p => p.Diff <= 0)Di2015NewLine        .TakeWhile(p => p.Diff > 0)Di2015NewLine        .Select(p => Tuple.Create(p.Num, p.Next))Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(ascending.Length == 0) return Enumerable.Empty<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ascending.Select(t => t.Item1).Concat(new int[] { ascending.Last().Item2 });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11857223Di2015UniqueSeparator /// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Class NameJSONConvertDi2015NewLine/// DescriptionJSON Class as JAVA'sDi2015NewLine/// Authorsppgame (The deserialization part is by ppgame. The serialization part is from http://www.mzwu.com/)Di2015NewLine/// Email: ppgame.mit@gmail.comDi2015NewLine/// Date2012-08-07Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class JSONConvertDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Global VariablesDi2015NewLine    private static char[] _charary;Di2015NewLine    private static int _aryend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region JSON DeserializationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Convert string to JSONObjectDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static JSONObject DeserializeSingletonObject(ref int left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        JSONObject localjson = new JSONObject();Di2015NewLine        while (left <= _aryend)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = _charary[left];Di2015NewLine            if (c == ' ' || c == '\\r' || c == '\\n' || c == '\\t')  //skip empty charDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (c == ',')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            char r = '\\0';Di2015NewLine            if (c == '\\"' || c == '\\'')     //beginning of keyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                r = c;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '}')      //end of JSONObjectDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int column = left;Di2015NewLine            while (!((_charary[column] == r || r == '\\0') && _charary[column - 1] != '\\\\' && _charary[column + 1] == ':')) column++;Di2015NewLine            if (r == '\\0') column++;Di2015NewLine            string key = new string(_charary, left, column - left);         //get the keyDi2015NewLine            if (r == '\\0')Di2015NewLine                left = column + 1;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                left = column + 2;Di2015NewLine            c = _charary[left];Di2015NewLine            while (c == ' ' || c == '\\r' || c == '\\n' || c == '\\t')  //skip empty charDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                c = _charary[left];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (c == '\\"' || c == '\\'')     //if value is stringDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                int strend = left;Di2015NewLine                while (_charary[strend] != c || _charary[strend - 1] == '\\\\') strend++;Di2015NewLine                localjson[key] = new string(_charary, left, strend - left);Di2015NewLine                left = strend + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '{') // JSONObjectDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                localjson[key] = DeserializeSingletonObject(ref left);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '[')     //JSONArrayDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                localjson[key] = DeserializeSingletonArray(ref left);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //other class, such as boolean, intDi2015NewLine                //all are converted to string, it can be enriched if in needDi2015NewLine                int comma = left;Di2015NewLine                char co = _charary[comma];Di2015NewLine                while (co != ',' && co != '}')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    comma++;Di2015NewLine                    co = _charary[comma];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                int em = comma - 1;Di2015NewLine                co = _charary[em];Di2015NewLine                while (co == ' ' || co == '\\r' || co == '\\n' || co == '\\t')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    em--;Di2015NewLine                    co = _charary[em];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                localjson[key] = new string(_charary, left, em - left + 1);Di2015NewLine                left = comma;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return localjson;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Convert string to JSONArrayDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static JSONArray DeserializeSingletonArray(ref int left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        JSONArray jsary = new JSONArray();Di2015NewLine        while (left <= _aryend)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = _charary[left];Di2015NewLine            if (c == ' ' || c == '\\r' || c == '\\n' || c == '\\t')  //skip empty charDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (c == ',')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (c == ']')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (c == '{') //JSONObjectDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                jsary.Add(DeserializeSingletonObject(ref left));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '[')     //JSONArrayDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                jsary.Add(DeserializeSingletonArray(ref left));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '\\"' || c == '\\'')            //stringDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                left++;Di2015NewLine                int strend = left;Di2015NewLine                while (_charary[strend] != c || _charary[strend - 1] == '\\\\') strend++;Di2015NewLine                jsary.Add(new string(_charary, left, strend - left));Di2015NewLine                left = strend + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //other class, such as boolean, intDi2015NewLine                //all are converted to string, it can be enriched if in needDi2015NewLine                int comma = left;Di2015NewLine                char co = _charary[comma];Di2015NewLine                while (co != ',' && co != ']')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    comma++;Di2015NewLine                    co = _charary[comma];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                int em = comma - 1;Di2015NewLine                co = _charary[em];Di2015NewLine                while (co == ' ' || co == '\\r' || co == '\\n' || co == '\\t')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    em--;Di2015NewLine                    co = _charary[em];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                jsary.Add(new string(_charary, left, em - left + 1));Di2015NewLine                left = comma;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return jsary;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Public InterfaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get a JSONObject instance from char[]Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static JSONObject DeserializeCharToObject(char[] input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _charary = input;Di2015NewLine        _aryend = _charary.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        while (_aryend > 0)Di2015NewLine            if (_charary[_aryend] != '}')Di2015NewLine                _aryend--;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        int start = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (start < _aryend)Di2015NewLine            if (_charary[start] != '{')Di2015NewLine                start++;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        start++;Di2015NewLine        if (_aryend < start + 1)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        return DeserializeSingletonObject(ref start);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get a JSONObject instance from stringDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static JSONObject DeserializeObject(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return DeserializeCharToObject(input.ToCharArray());     //The first char must be '{'Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get a JSONArray instance from char[]Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static JSONArray DeserializeCharsToArray(char[] input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _charary = input;Di2015NewLine        _aryend = _charary.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        while (_aryend > 0)Di2015NewLine            if (_charary[_aryend] != ']')Di2015NewLine                _aryend--;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        int start = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (start < _aryend)Di2015NewLine            if (_charary[start] != '[')Di2015NewLine                start++;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        start++;Di2015NewLine        if (_aryend < start + 1)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        return DeserializeSingletonArray(ref start);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get a JSONArray instance from stringDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static JSONArray DeserializeArray(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return DeserializeCharsToArray(input.ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Serialize a JSONObject instanceDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="jsonObject"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string SerializeObject(JSONObject jsonObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("{");Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> kvp in jsonObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (kvp.Value is JSONObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("\\"{0}\\":{1},", kvp.Key, SerializeObject((JSONObject)kvp.Value)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (kvp.Value is JSONArray)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("\\"{0}\\":{1},", kvp.Key, SerializeArray((JSONArray)kvp.Value)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (kvp.Value is string)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("\\"{0}\\":\\"{1}\\",", kvp.Key, kvp.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("\\"{0}\\":\\"{1}\\",", kvp.Key, ""));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (sb.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine            sb.Remove(sb.Length - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("}");Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Serialize a JSONArray instanceDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="jsonArray"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string SerializeArray(JSONArray jsonArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("[");Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (jsonArray[i] is JSONObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("{0},", SerializeObject((JSONObject)jsonArray[i])));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (jsonArray[i] is JSONArray)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("{0},", SerializeArray((JSONArray)jsonArray[i])));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (jsonArray[i] is string)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("\\"{0}\\",", jsonArray[i]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(string.Format("\\"{0}\\",", ""));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (sb.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine            sb.Remove(sb.Length - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("]");Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// 11863868Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<DriveInfo> driveList = DriveInfo.GetDrives().Where(x => x.IsReady).ToList<DriveInfo>(); //Get all the drive infoDi2015NewLine    Server server = new Server();  //Create  the server objectDi2015NewLine    ServerDrive serverDrives = new ServerDrive();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Program c = new Program();Di2015NewLine        c.FakeDriveInfo();Di2015NewLine        c.RealDriveInfo();Di2015NewLine        c.WriteInToDB();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string FormatBytes(long bytes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int scale = 1024;Di2015NewLine        string[] orders = new string[] { "GB", "MB", "KB", "Bytes" };Di2015NewLine        long max = (long)Math.Pow(scale, orders.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string order in orders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (bytes > max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("{0:##.##} {1}", Decimal.Divide(bytes, max), order);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            max /= scale;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "0 Bytes";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void FakeDriveInfo()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.White;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Server ID :      {0}", server.ServerID = 0);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Server Name :    {0}", server.ServerName = string.Concat(System.Environment.MachineName));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < driveList.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Drive Letter:    {0}", driveList[i].Name);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Total Size:      {0}", FormatBytes(driveList[i].TotalSize));Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Volume Label:    {0}", driveList[i].VolumeLabel);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Free Space:      {0}", FormatBytes(driveList[i].TotalFreeSpace));Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Drive Format:    {0}", driveList[i].DriveFormat);Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RealDriveInfo()Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Insert information of one server - You will need get information of all serversDi2015NewLine            server.ServerID = 0; I recommend doing the SQL server will automatically generate the PK.Di2015NewLine            server.ServerName = string.Concat(System.Environment.MachineName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Inserts information in the newServers objectDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < driveList.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Put here all the information to obeject Server                Di2015NewLine                serverDrives.DriveLetter = driveList[i].Name;Di2015NewLine                serverDrives.TotalSpace = driveList[i].TotalSize;Di2015NewLine                serverDrives.DriveLabel = driveList[i].VolumeLabel;Di2015NewLine                serverDrives.FreeSpace = driveList[i].TotalFreeSpace;Di2015NewLine                serverDrives.DriveType = driveList[i].DriveFormat;Di2015NewLine                server.ServerDrives.Add(serverDrives);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteInToDB()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Add the information to an SQL Database using Linq.Di2015NewLine        DataClasses1DataContext db = new DataClasses1DataContext(@"cspsqldev");Di2015NewLine        //   db.Servers.InsertAllOnSubmit(server);Di2015NewLine        db.Servers.InsertOnSubmit(server);Di2015NewLine        db.SubmitChanges();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11869161Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static RangeGroup Find(uint number) {Di2015NewLine    int position = RangeGroups.Count / 2;Di2015NewLine    int stepSize = position / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true) {Di2015NewLine        if (stepSize == 0) {Di2015NewLine            // Couldn't find it.Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (RangeGroups[position].High < number) {Di2015NewLine            // Search down.Di2015NewLine            position -= stepSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } else if (RangeGroups[position].Low > number) {Di2015NewLine            // Search up.Di2015NewLine            position += stepSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            // Found it!Di2015NewLine            return RangeGroups[position];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stepSize /= 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11871129Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetNextPeak
11871129Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Task GetNextPeakAsync(CancellationToken token)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Start in a new task.Di2015NewLine    return Task.Factory.StartNew(() => {Di2015NewLine        // Store the counter outside of the loop.Di2015NewLine        var cpuCounter = Di2015NewLine            new PerformanceCounter("Processor", "% Processor Time", "_Total");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cycle while there is no cancellation.Di2015NewLine        while (!token.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Wait before getting the next value.Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the next value.Di2015NewLine            double currentValue = cpuCounter.NextValue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentValue > thisCPUPeak)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                thisCPUPeak = currentValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The action to perform.Di2015NewLine            Action<double, double> a = (cv, p) => {Di2015NewLine                CurrentCPUPeak.Text = cv.ToString();Di2015NewLine                CPUPeak.Text = p.ToString();Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startStopButton.Dispatcher.Invoke(a, Di2015NewLine                new object[] { currentValue, thisCPUPeak });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11871129Di2015UniqueSeparatorStartOrStop
11871129Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void StartOrStop(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If there is a task, then stop it.Di2015NewLine    if (task != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Dispose of the source when done.Di2015NewLine        using (cancellationTokenSource)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Cancel.Di2015NewLine            cancellationTokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set values to null.Di2015NewLine        task = null;Di2015NewLine        cancellationTokenSource = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Update UI.Di2015NewLine        startStopButton.Content = "Resume";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Update UI.Di2015NewLine        startStopButton.Content = "Stop";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the cancellation token source, andDi2015NewLine        // pass the token in when starting the task.Di2015NewLine        cancellationTokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        task = GetNextPeakAsync(cancellationTokenSource.Token);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11872078Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetChildIndex
11872178Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Cell> GetCellIntersections (Cell cell1, Cell cell2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Cell c1 = null;Di2015NewLine    Cell c2 = null;Di2015NewLine    List<Cell> cells = null;Di2015NewLine    System.Numerics.BigInteger delta = 0;Di2015NewLine    System.Numerics.BigInteger deltaHalf = 0;Di2015NewLine    System.Numerics.BigInteger width = 0;Di2015NewLine    System.Numerics.BigInteger height = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cells = new List<Cell>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Sorting on y reduces conditions from 8 to 4.Di2015NewLine    if (cell1.Y < cell2.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c1 = cell1;Di2015NewLine        c2 = cell2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c1 = cell2;Di2015NewLine        c2 = cell1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((c1.X != c2.X) && (c1.Y != c2.Y))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        width = System.Numerics.BigInteger.Abs(c2.X - c1.X);Di2015NewLine        height = System.Numerics.BigInteger.Abs(c2.Y - c1.Y);Di2015NewLine        delta = System.Numerics.BigInteger.Abs(height - width);Di2015NewLine        deltaHalf = System.Numerics.BigInteger.Divide(delta, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((c1.X < c2.X) && (c1.Y < c2.Y))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (width < height)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c1.X - deltaHalf, c1.Y + deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c2.X + deltaHalf, c2.Y - deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c1.X + deltaHalf, c1.Y - deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c2.X - deltaHalf, c2.Y + deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (width < height)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c1.X + deltaHalf, c1.Y + deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c2.X - deltaHalf, c2.Y - deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c1.X - deltaHalf, c1.Y - deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine                cells.Add(new Cell(this, c2.X + deltaHalf, c2.Y + deltaHalf));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (cells);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11872592Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass InternetConnector  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    private struct ConnectionDataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Action<Exception> ErrorHandler { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Socket Socket { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ConnectToHost(Action<Exception> errorHandler)  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        IPEndPoint ip = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse(connector_host), connector_port);  Di2015NewLine        client = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var connectionData = new ConnectionData { ErrorHandler = errorHandler, Socket = client };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        client.Blocking = true;  Di2015NewLine        client.BeginConnect(ip, new AsyncCallback(ConnectCallback), connectionData);  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ConnectCallback(IAsyncResult ar)  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        ConnectionData connectionData = new ConnectionData();Di2015NewLine        try  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            connectionData = (ConnectionData)ar.AsyncState;  Di2015NewLine            connectionData.Socket.EndConnect(ar);  Di2015NewLine            connectDone.Set();  Di2015NewLine            Connected = true;  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            if (connectionData.ErrorHandler != null)Di2015NewLine                connectionData.ErrorHandler(e);Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic partial class Form1 : Form       Di2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine    private bool isRunning = false;       Di2015NewLine    private InternetConnector client = new InternetConnector();       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AsyncErrorHandler(Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (status.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // queue a call to ourself on control's UI thread and immediately returnDi2015NewLine            status.BeginInvoke(new Action(()=>AsyncErrorHandler(e)));Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we are on the right thread to set the status textDi2015NewLine        status.Text = "Async Error: " + ex.Message;  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void startStop_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)       Di2015NewLine    {       Di2015NewLine        try       Di2015NewLine        {       Di2015NewLine            if (!isRunning || !InternetConnector.Connected)       Di2015NewLine            {       Di2015NewLine                if (!InternetConnector.Connected)       Di2015NewLine                {       Di2015NewLine                    client.SetAddress(ipAddress.Text);       Di2015NewLine                    client.SetPort(Convert.ToInt32(connectionport.Text));       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // connect, pass in the method to use for error reportingDi2015NewLine                    client.ConnectToHost(AsyncErrorHandler);       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    status.Text = "Signals Receiver: Connected";       Di2015NewLine                    status.ForeColor = Color.Green;       Di2015NewLine                    startStop.Text = "Stop";       Di2015NewLine                    isRunning = true;       Di2015NewLine                }       Di2015NewLine                else       Di2015NewLine                {       Di2015NewLine                    startStop.Text = "Start";       Di2015NewLine                    client.DisconnectFromHost();       Di2015NewLine                    isRunning = false;       Di2015NewLine                }       Di2015NewLine            }       Di2015NewLine        }       Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)       Di2015NewLine        {       Di2015NewLine            status.Text = "Socket Error: " + ex.Message;       Di2015NewLine        }       Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLine}       Di2015NewLine

11874876Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void WriteTextToRichTextBox()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // Clear all text from the RichTextBox;Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.Clear();Di2015NewLine   // Set the font for the opening text to a larger Arial font;Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionFont = new Font("Arial", 16);Di2015NewLine   // Assign the introduction text to the RichTextBox control.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectedText = "The following is a list of bulleted items:" + "\\n";Di2015NewLine   // Set the Font for the first item to a smaller size Arial font.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionFont = new Font("Arial", 12);Di2015NewLine   // Specify that the following items are to be added to a bulleted list.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionBullet = true;Di2015NewLine   // Set the color of the item text.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionColor = Color.Red;Di2015NewLine   // Assign the text to the bulleted item.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectedText = "Apples" + "\\n";Di2015NewLine   // Apply same font since font settings do not carry to next line.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionFont = new Font("Arial", 12);Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionColor = Color.Orange;Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectedText = "Oranges" + "\\n";Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionFont = new Font("Arial", 12);Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionColor = Color.Purple;Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectedText = "Grapes" + "\\n";Di2015NewLine   // End the bulleted list.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionBullet = false;Di2015NewLine   // Specify the font size and string for text displayed below bulleted list.Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectionFont = new Font("Arial", 16);Di2015NewLine   richTextBox1.SelectedText = "Bulleted Text Complete!";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11875649Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IEdgeCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool AddEdge(string node1, string node2);Di2015NewLine    bool ContainsEdge(string node1, string node2);Di2015NewLine    bool RemoveEdge(string node1, string node2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass EdgeSet1 : IEdgeCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private HashSet<string> _edges = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string MakeEdgeKey(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return StringComparer.Ordinal.Compare(node1, node2) < 0 ? node1 + node2 : node2 + node1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AddEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Add(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ContainsEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Contains(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool RemoveEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass EdgeSet2 : IEdgeCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private HashSet<Tuple<string, string>> _edges = new HashSet<Tuple<string, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Tuple<string, string> MakeEdgeKey(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return StringComparer.Ordinal.Compare(node1, node2) < 0 Di2015NewLine            ? new Tuple<string, string>(node1, node2) Di2015NewLine            : new Tuple<string, string>(node2, node1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AddEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Add(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ContainsEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Contains(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool RemoveEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass EdgeSet3 : IEdgeCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private HashSet<Tuple<string, string>> _edges = new HashSet<Tuple<string, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Tuple<string, string> MakeEdgeKey(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Tuple<string, string>(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AddEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key1 = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        var key2 = MakeEdgeKey(node2, node1);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Add(key1) && _edges.Add(key2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ContainsEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Contains(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool RemoveEdge(string node1, string node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key1 = MakeEdgeKey(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine        var key2 = MakeEdgeKey(node2, node1);Di2015NewLine        return _edges.Remove(key1) && _edges.Remove(key2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Test(string[] nodes, IEdgeCollection edges, int edgeCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use edgeCount as seed to rng to ensure test reproducibilityDi2015NewLine        var rng = new Random(edgeCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // store known edges in a separate data structure for validationDi2015NewLine        var edgeList = new List<Tuple<string, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch stopwatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // randomly generated edgesDi2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < edgeCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string node1 = nodes[rng.Next(nodes.Length)];Di2015NewLine            string node2 = nodes[rng.Next(nodes.Length)];Di2015NewLine            edges.AddEdge(node1, node2);Di2015NewLine            edgeList.Add(new Tuple<string, string>(node1, node2));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var addElapsed = stopwatch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // non random lookupsDi2015NewLine        int nonRandomFound = 0;Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var edge in edgeList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (edges.ContainsEdge(edge.Item1, edge.Item2))Di2015NewLine                nonRandomFound++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var nonRandomLookupElapsed = stopwatch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLine        if (nonRandomFound != edgeList.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("The edge collection {0} is not working right!", edges.GetType().FullName);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // random lookupsDi2015NewLine        int randomFound = 0;Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < edgeCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string node1 = nodes[rng.Next(nodes.Length)];Di2015NewLine            string node2 = nodes[rng.Next(nodes.Length)];Di2015NewLine            if (edges.ContainsEdge(node1, node2))Di2015NewLine                randomFound++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var randomLookupElapsed = stopwatch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // remove allDi2015NewLine        stopwatch.Start();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var edge in edgeList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            edges.RemoveEdge(edge.Item1, edge.Item2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var removeElapsed = stopwatch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Test: {0} with {1} edges: {2}s addition, {3}s non-random lookup, {4}s random lookup, {5}s removal",Di2015NewLine            edges.GetType().FullName,Di2015NewLine            edgeCount,Di2015NewLine            addElapsed.TotalSeconds,Di2015NewLine            nonRandomLookupElapsed.TotalSeconds,Di2015NewLine            randomLookupElapsed.TotalSeconds,Di2015NewLine            removeElapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rng = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var nodes = new string[5000];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < nodes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder name = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            int length = rng.Next(7, 15);Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                name.Append((char) rng.Next(32, 127));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            nodes[i] = name.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEdgeCollection edges1 = new EdgeSet1();Di2015NewLine        IEdgeCollection edges2 = new EdgeSet2();Di2015NewLine        IEdgeCollection edges3 = new EdgeSet3();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Test(nodes, edges1, 2000000);Di2015NewLine        Test(nodes, edges2, 2000000);Di2015NewLine        Test(nodes, edges3, 2000000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11876339Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass InternetConnector Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    private struct ConnectionData Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        public Action<Socket> SuccessHandler { get; set; } Di2015NewLine        public Action<Exception> ErrorHandler { get; set; } Di2015NewLine        public Socket Socket { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ConnectToHost(Action<Socket> successHandler, Action<Exception> errorHandler) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        IPEndPoint ip = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse(connector_host), connector_port); Di2015NewLine        client = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp); Di2015NewLine        var ConnectionData = new ConnectionData Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            SuccessHandler = successHandler,Di2015NewLine            ErrorHandler = errorHandler, Di2015NewLine            Socket = client Di2015NewLine        }; Di2015NewLine        client.Blocking = true; Di2015NewLine        client.BeginConnect(ip, new AsyncCallback(ConnectCallback), connectionData); // <--  make sure to use the lower-case connectionData here!  :)Di2015NewLine        connectDone.WaitOne(100); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ConnectCallback(IAsyncResult ar) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        ConnectionData connectionData = new ConnectionData(); Di2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            connectionData = (ConnectionData)ar.AsyncState; Di2015NewLine            connectionData.Socket.EndConnect(ar); Di2015NewLine            connectDone.Set(); Di2015NewLine            Connected = true; Di2015NewLine            if (connectionData.SuccessHandler != null)Di2015NewLine                connectionData.SuccessHandler(connectionData.Socket);Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            if (connectionData.ErrorHandler != null) Di2015NewLine                connectionData.ErrorHandler(e); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

11876868Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Starts a video.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="url">The URL of the video to play.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="startPosition">The start position of the video. This value must be between 0 and 1</param>Di2015NewLine    public void StartVideo(Uri url, float startPosition = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (startPosition > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Start Position must be between 0 and 1");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TcpClient tcpClient = new TcpClient("192.168.1.20", 7000);Di2015NewLine        tcpClient.ReceiveTimeout = 100000;Di2015NewLine        tcpClient.SendTimeout = 100000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get the client stream to read data from.Di2015NewLine        NetworkStream clientStream = tcpClient.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string body =Di2015NewLine       "Content-Location: " + url + "\\n" +Di2015NewLine       "Start-Position: " + startPosition + "\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string request = "POST /play HTTP/1.1\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "User-Agent: MediaControl/1.0\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "Content-Type: text/parameters\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "Content-Length: " + Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(body).Length + "\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "X-Apple-Session-ID:" + _sessionGuid.ToString() + "\\n\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Send the headersDi2015NewLine        sendMessage(clientStream, request);Di2015NewLine        //Send the bodyDi2015NewLine        sendMessage(clientStream, body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the responseDi2015NewLine        byte[] myReadBuffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder myCompleteMessage = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        int numberOfBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine        numberOfBytesRead = clientStream.Read(myReadBuffer, 0, myReadBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        myCompleteMessage.Append(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(myReadBuffer, 0, numberOfBytesRead));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now start doing a "keepalive"Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Simply send the characters "ok" every two secondsDi2015NewLine            sendMessage(clientStream, "ok");Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine        }                      Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sends a message across the NetworkStreamDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="clientStream">The stream to send the message down</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="message">The message to send</param>Di2015NewLine    public void sendMessage(NetworkStream clientStream, string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new ASCIIEncoding().GetBytes(message);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            clientStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            clientStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (System.IO.IOException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("IOException: " + e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11889259Di2015UniqueSeparator// The Unix epoch is 1970-01-01 00:00:00.000Di2015NewLineDateTime   UNIX_EPOCH = new DateTime( 1970 , 1 , 1 ) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The Unix epoch represented in CLR ticks.Di2015NewLine// This is also available as UNIX_EPOCH.TicksDi2015NewLineconst long UNIX_EPOCH_IN_CLR_TICKS = 621355968000000000 ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A CLR tick is 1/10000000 second (100ns).Di2015NewLine// Available as Timespan.TicksPerSecondDi2015NewLineconst long CLR_TICKS_PER_SECOND = 10000000 ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDateTime now       = DateTime.Now                        ; // current moment in timeDi2015NewLinelong     ticks_now = now.Ticks                           ; // get its number of ticsDi2015NewLinelong     ticks     = ticks_now - UNIX_EPOCH_IN_CLR_TICKS ; // compute the current moment in time as the number of ticks since the Unix epoch began.Di2015NewLinelong     time_t    = ticks / CLR_TICKS_PER_SECOND        ; // convert that to a time_t, the number of seconds since the Unix EpochDi2015NewLineDateTime computed  = EPOCH.AddSeconds( time_t )          ; // and convert back to a date time valueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 'computed' is the the current time with 1-second precision.Di2015NewLine

11896724Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsortedStringList.Sort(new AlphanumComparatorFastString());Di2015NewLine
11896724Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class AlphanumComparatorFastString : IComparer<String>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Compare(string s1, string s2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (s1 == null)Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (s2 == null)Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int len1 = s1.Length;Di2015NewLine            int len2 = s2.Length;Di2015NewLine            int marker1 = 0;Di2015NewLine            int marker2 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Walk through two the strings with two markers.Di2015NewLine            while (marker1 < len1 && marker2 < len2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char ch1 = s1[marker1];Di2015NewLine                char ch2 = s2[marker2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Some buffers we can build up characters in for each chunk.Di2015NewLine                char[] space1 = new char[len1];Di2015NewLine                int loc1 = 0;Di2015NewLine                char[] space2 = new char[len2];Di2015NewLine                int loc2 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Walk through all following characters that are digits orDi2015NewLine                // characters in BOTH strings starting at the appropriate marker.Di2015NewLine                // Collect char arrays.Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    space1[loc1++] = ch1;Di2015NewLine                    marker1++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (marker1 < len1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ch1 = s1[marker1];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } while (char.IsDigit(ch1) == char.IsDigit(space1[0]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    space2[loc2++] = ch2;Di2015NewLine                    marker2++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (marker2 < len2)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ch2 = s2[marker2];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } while (char.IsDigit(ch2) == char.IsDigit(space2[0]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If we have collected numbers, compare them numerically.Di2015NewLine                // Otherwise, if we have strings, compare them alphabetically.Di2015NewLine                string str1 = new string(space1);Di2015NewLine                string str2 = new string(space2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (char.IsDigit(space1[0]) && char.IsDigit(space2[0]))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int thisNumericChunk = int.Parse(str1);Di2015NewLine                    int thatNumericChunk = int.Parse(str2);Di2015NewLine                    result = thisNumericChunk.CompareTo(thatNumericChunk);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = str1.CompareTo(str2);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return len1 - len2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11898036Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BaseEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass MessageList : BaseEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Application:BaseEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<BaseEntity> MessageLists { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Application()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageLists = new List<BaseEntity>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ExpressionHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Action<object,object> GetMethod(string targetTypename,string targetMemberName,string sourceTypeName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression targetExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression propertyExpression = Expression.PropertyOrField(Expression.TypeAs(targetExpression, Type.GetType(targetTypename)), targetMemberName);Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression sourceExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        Expression callExpression = Expression.Call(propertyExpression, "Add", null, Expression.TypeAs(sourceExpression, Type.GetType(sourceTypeName)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<object, object>>(callExpression, targetExpression, sourceExpression);Di2015NewLine        var method = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine        return method;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11898045Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace CustomControlsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region USINGDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLine    using System.Drawing;Di2015NewLine    using System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class CustomTabControl : TabControlDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region VARIABLESDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int hotTrackTab = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region INSTANCE CONSTRUCTORSDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CustomTabControl() : base()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region INSTANCE METHODSDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void InitializeComponent()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.SetStyle(ControlStyles.UserPaint, true);Di2015NewLine            this.SetStyle(ControlStyles.AllPaintingInWmPaint, true);Di2015NewLine            this.SetStyle(ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer, true);Di2015NewLine            this.SetStyle(ControlStyles.ResizeRedraw, true);Di2015NewLine            this.SetStyle(ControlStyles.SupportsTransparentBackColor, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.DrawMode = TabDrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int GetTabUnderCursor()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point cursor = this.PointToClient(Cursor.Position);Di2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index < this.TabPages.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.GetTabRect(index).Contains(cursor))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return index;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void UpdateHotTrack()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int hot = GetTabUnderCursor();Di2015NewLine            if (hot != this.hotTrackTab)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.hotTrackTab != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Invalidate(this.GetTabRect(this.hotTrackTab));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                this.hotTrackTab = hot;Di2015NewLine                if (this.hotTrackTab != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Invalidate(this.GetTabRect(this.hotTrackTab));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                this.Update();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region OVERRIDE METHODSDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnMouseEnter(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnMouseEnter(e);Di2015NewLine 11898420Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<T> MergeSort<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IList<T> unsorted,Di2015NewLine    IComparer<T> comparer = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (unsorted == null ||  unsorted.Count < 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return unsorted;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (comparer == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comparer = Comparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IList<T> sorted = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    int middle = (int)unsorted.Count/2;Di2015NewLine    Ilist<T> left = unsorted.GetRange(0, middle);Di2015NewLine    IList<T> right = unsorted.GetRange(middle, unsorted.Count - middle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sortLeft = Task<IList<T>>.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine        () => left.MergeSort(comparer));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sortRight = Task<IList<T>>.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine        () => right.MergeSort(comparer));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    left = sortLeft.Result;Di2015NewLine    right = sortRight.Result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int leftPtr = 0;Di2015NewLine    int rightPtr = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < left.Count + right.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (leftPtr == left.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sorted.Add(right[rightPtr]);Di2015NewLine            rightPtr++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (rightPtr == right.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sorted.Add(left[leftPtr]);Di2015NewLine            leftPtr++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (comparer.Compare(left[leftPtr], right[rightPtr]) < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sorted.Add(left[leftPtr]);Di2015NewLine            leftPtr++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sorted.Add(right[rightPtr]);Di2015NewLine            rightPtr++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sorted;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

    static string test1 = "A^@[BCD";Di2015NewLine        static string test2 = "E]FGH\\\\";Di2015NewLine        static string test3 = "ijk`l}m";Di2015NewLine        static string test4 = "nopq~{r";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static readonly Dictionary<char, string> repl =Di2015NewLine            new Dictionary<char, string> Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                {'^', ""}, {'@', ""}, {'[', ""}, {']', ""}, {'`', ""}, {'}', ""}, {'~', "?"}, {'{', ""}, {'\\\\', "?"} Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static readonly Regex replaceRegex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Program() // static initializer Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder pattern = new pattern.Append(']');Di2015NewLine            replaceRegex = new Regex(pattern.ToString(), RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string '?').Replace('{', '').Replace('\\\\', '?').ToString(); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Method for replacing chars with a mapping Di2015NewLine        static string    {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < 5; i++)Di2015NewLine                DoIt(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void DoIt(int n)Di2015NewLine         Regex reg = new Regex(@"\\^@\\[\\]`\\}~\\{\\\\");Di2015NewLine            MatchEvaluator eval = match =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (match.Value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "^": return "";Di2015NewLine                    case "@": return "";Di2015NewLine                    case "[": return "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            for (idx = 0; idx < 500000; idx++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string result1 = reg.Replace(test1, 11902601Di2015UniqueSeparatorDrawBinaryTree
11902601Di2015UniqueSeparatorDrawBinaryTree
11902601Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DrawBinaryTree(int depth, StylusPoint pt, double length, double theta)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    if (depth > 0)Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        StylusPoint spXY = new StylusPoint(pt.X + length * Math.Cos(theta) * Math.Cos(a), pt.Y + length * Math.Sin(theta) * Math.Sin(a));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SPC.Add(pt);Di2015NewLine        SPC.Add(spXY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //spXY has the values you just set above Di2015NewLine        DrawBinaryTree(depth - 1, spXY, length * lengthScale, theta + deltaTheta);Di2015NewLine        //since spXY is local, it still has the values you set above in thisDi2015NewLine        //call to the function (recursive calls have not modified it)Di2015NewLine        DrawBinaryTree(depth - 1, spXY, length * lengthScale, theta - deltaTheta);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11902601Di2015UniqueSeparatorStylusPoint spXY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DrawBinaryTree(int depth, StylusPoint pt, double length, double theta)Di2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    if (depth > 0)Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        spXY = new StylusPoint(pt.X + length * Math.Cos(theta) * Math.Cos(a), pt.Y + length * Math.Sin(theta) * Math.Sin(a));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SPC.Add(pt);Di2015NewLine        SPC.Add(spXY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //spXY has the values you just set above Di2015NewLine        //(assuming there are no other functions running on other threads that modify it)Di2015NewLine        DrawBinaryTree(depth - 1, spXY, length * lengthScale, theta + deltaTheta);Di2015NewLine        //spXY now has the values from the last recursive call to DrawBinaryTree!Di2015NewLine        DrawBinaryTree(depth - 1, spXY, length * lengthScale, theta - deltaTheta);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11902727Di2015UniqueSeparator    public  static MvcHtmlString ValidationMessageFor<TModel, TProperty>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression, bool addRequiredFieldMark)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ValidationMessageFor(htmlHelper, expression, null /* validationMessage */, new RouteValueDictionary(), addRequiredFieldMark: addRequiredFieldMark);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MvcHtmlString ValidationMessageFor<TModel, TProperty>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression, string validationMessage, IDictionary<string, object> htmlAttributes, bool? addRequiredFieldMark=false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ValidationMessageHelper(htmlHelper,Di2015NewLine                                       ModelMetadata.FromLambdaExpression(expression, htmlHelper.ViewData),Di2015NewLine                                       ExpressionHelper.GetExpressionText(expression),Di2015NewLine                                       validationMessage,Di2015NewLine                                       htmlAttributes,Di2015NewLine                                       addRequiredFieldMark:addRequiredFieldMark);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MvcHtmlString ValidationMessageHelper(this HtmlHelper htmlHelper, ModelMetadata modelMetadata, string expression, string validationMessage, IDictionary<string, object> htmlAttributes, bool? addRequiredFieldMark = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string modelName = htmlHelper.ViewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldName(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Changed (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8380988/how-to-customize-html-validationmessagefor-in-asp-mvc).Di2015NewLine        //FormContext formContext = htmlHelper.ViewContext.GetFormContextForClientValidation();Di2015NewLine        FormContext formContext = htmlHelper.ViewContext.ClientValidationEnabled ? htmlHelper.ViewContext.FormContext : null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!htmlHelper.ViewData.ModelState.ContainsKey(modelName) && formContext == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ModelState modelState = htmlHelper.ViewData.ModelState[modelName];Di2015NewLine        ModelErrorCollection modelErrors = (modelState == null) ? null : modelState.Errors;Di2015NewLine        ModelError modelError = (((modelErrors == null) || (modelErrors.Count == 0)) ? null : modelErrors.FirstOrDefault(m => !String.IsNullOrEmpty(m.ErrorMessage)) ?? modelErrors[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (modelError == null && formContext == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TagBuilder builder = new TagBuilder("span");Di2015NewLine        builder.MergeAttributes(htmlAttributes);Di2015NewLine        builder.AddCssClass((modelError != null) ? HtmlHelper.ValidationMessageCssClassName : HtmlHelper.ValidationMessageValidCssClassName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(validationMessage))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.SetInnerText(validationMessage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (modelError != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.SetInnerText(GetUserErrorMessageOrDefault(htmlHelper.ViewContext.HttpContext, modelError, modelState));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (formContext != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool replaceValidationMessageContents = String.IsNullOrEmpty(validationMessage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // AdditionDi2015NewLine            if (modelMetadata != null && modelMetadata.IsRequired && addRequiredFieldMark.HasValue && addRequiredFieldMark.Value)Di2015NewLine                builder.SetInnerText("*");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (htmlHelper.ViewContext.UnobtrusiveJavaScriptEnabled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                builder.MergeAttribute("data-valmsg-for", modelName);Di2015NewLine                builder.MergeAttribute("data-valmsg-replace", replaceValidationMessageContents.ToString().ToLowerInvariant());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FieldValidationMetadata fieldMetadata = ApplyFieldValidationMetadata(htmlHelper, modelMetadata, modelName);Di2015NewLine                // rules will already have been written to the metadata objectDi2015NewLine                fieldMetadata.ReplaceValidationMessageContents = replaceValidationMessageContents; // only replace contents if no explicit message was specifiedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // client validation always requires an IDDi2015NewLine                builder.GenerateId(modelName + "_validationMessage");Di2015NewLine                fieldMetadata.ValidationMessageId = builder.Attributes["id"];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return MvcHtmlString.Create(builder.ToString(TagRenderMode.Normal));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11908559Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void WriteTextToImage(string inputFile, string outputFile, FormattedText text, Point position)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BitmapImage bitmap = new BitmapImage(new Uri(inputFile)); // inputFile must be absolute pathDi2015NewLine    DrawingVisual visual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (DrawingContext dc = visual.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dc.DrawImage(bitmap, new Rect(0, 0, bitmap.PixelWidth, bitmap.PixelHeight));Di2015NewLine        dc.DrawText(text, position);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RenderTargetBitmap target = new RenderTargetBitmap(bitmap.PixelWidth, bitmap.PixelHeight,Di2015NewLine                                                       bitmap.DpiX, bitmap.DpiY, PixelFormats.Default);Di2015NewLine    target.Render(visual);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BitmapEncoder encoder = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (Path.GetExtension(outputFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ".png":Di2015NewLine            encoder = new PngBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        // more encoders hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (encoder != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        encoder.Frames.Add(BitmapFrame.Create(target));Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream outputStream = new FileStream(outputFile, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            encoder.Save(outputStream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11908559Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void WriteTextToImage(string inputFile, string outputFile, FormattedText text,Di2015NewLine    Rect textRect, HorizontalAlignment hAlign, VerticalAlignment vAlign)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BitmapImage bitmap = new BitmapImage(new Uri(inputFile));Di2015NewLine    DrawingVisual visual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLine    Point position = textRect.Location;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (hAlign)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case HorizontalAlignment.Center:Di2015NewLine            position.X += (textRect.Width - text.Width) / 2;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case HorizontalAlignment.Right:Di2015NewLine            position.X += textRect.Width - text.Width;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (vAlign)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case VerticalAlignment.Center:Di2015NewLine            position.Y += (textRect.Height - text.Height) / 2;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case VerticalAlignment.Bottom:Di2015NewLine            position.Y += textRect.Height - text.Height;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (DrawingContext dc = visual.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dc.DrawImage(bitmap, new Rect(0, 0, bitmap.PixelWidth, bitmap.PixelHeight));Di2015NewLine        dc.DrawText(text, position);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RenderTargetBitmap target = new RenderTargetBitmap(bitmap.PixelWidth, bitmap.PixelHeight,Di2015NewLine                                                       bitmap.DpiX, bitmap.DpiY, PixelFormats.Default);Di2015NewLine    target.Render(visual);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BitmapEncoder encoder = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (Path.GetExtension(outputFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ".png":Di2015NewLine            encoder = new PngBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ".jpg":Di2015NewLine            encoder = new JpegBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (encoder != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        encoder.Frames.Add(BitmapFrame.Create(target));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (FileStream outputStream = new FileStream(outputFile, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            encoder.Save(outputStream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11913724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool removeStock(string user_name,string stock_symbol) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    user_name = user_name.Trim(); Di2015NewLine    stock_symbol = stock_symbol.Trim(); Di2015NewLine    string statement = "DELETE FROM users_stocks " + Di2015NewLine                        "WHERE user_name = @name AND stock_symbol = @stock" ; Di2015NewLine    SqlCommand cmdnon = new SqlCommand(statement, connection); Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        cmdnon.Parameters.AddWithValue("@name", user_name);Di2015NewLine        cmdnon.Parameters.AddWithValue("@stock", stock_symbol);Di2015NewLine        connection.Open(); Di2015NewLine        int num = cmdnon.ExecuteNonQuery(); Di2015NewLine        connection.Close(); Di2015NewLine        return true; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    catch (SqlException ex) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString()); Di2015NewLine        connection.Close(); Di2015NewLine        return false; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
11913833Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<T> Replace<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, IDictionary<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  foreach (var kvp in values)Di2015NewLine    source = ReplaceOne(source, kvp.Key, kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine  return source;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<T> ReplaceOne<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, IEnumerable<T> fromSeq, IEnumerable<T> toSeq)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var sArr = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int replLength = fromSeq.Count();Di2015NewLine  if (replLength != toSeq.Count())Di2015NewLine    throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int idx = 0; idx <= sArr.Length - replLength; idx++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var testSeq = Enumerable.Range(idx, replLength).Select(i => sArr[i]);Di2015NewLine    if (testSeq.SequenceEqual(fromSeq))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Array.Copy(toSeq.ToArray(), 0, sArr, idx, replLength);Di2015NewLine      idx += replLength - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return sArr;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
