11920905Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace dataTableTesting2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {          Di2015NewLine        private static const int BufferSize = 20; //Each buffer can only contain this many elements at a timeDi2015NewLine                                                  //This limits the total amount of memory Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static const int MaxBlockSize = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static BlockingCollection<string> buffer1 = new BlockingCollection<string>(BufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static BlockingCollection<string[]> buffer2 = new BlockingCollection<string[]>(BufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static BlockingCollection<Object[][]> buffer3 = new BlockingCollection<Object[][]>(BufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Start Pipelines and wait for them to finish.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TaskFactory f = new TaskFactory(TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning, TaskContinuationOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task stage0 = f.StartNew(() => PopulateFilesList(buffer1));Di2015NewLine            Task stage1 = f.StartNew(() => ReadFiles(buffer1, buffer2));Di2015NewLine            Task stage2 = f.StartNew(() => ParseStringBlocks(buffer2, buffer3));Di2015NewLine            Task stage3 = f.StartNew(() => UploadBlocks(buffer3) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task.WaitAll(stage0, stage1, stage2, stage3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            // Note for more workers on particular stages you can make more tasks for each stage, like the followingDi2015NewLine            //    which populates the file list in 1 task, reads the files into string[] blocks in 1 task,Di2015NewLine            //    then parses the string[] blocks in 4 concurrent tasksDi2015NewLine            //    and lastly uploads the info in 2 tasksDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TaskFactory f = new TaskFactory(TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning, TaskContinuationOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task stage0 = f.StartNew(() => PopulateFilesList(buffer1));Di2015NewLine            Task stage1 = f.StartNew(() => ReadFiles(buffer1, buffer2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task stage2a = f.StartNew(() => ParseStringBlocks(buffer2, buffer3));Di2015NewLine            Task stage2b = f.StartNew(() => ParseStringBlocks(buffer2, buffer3));Di2015NewLine            Task stage2c = f.StartNew(() => ParseStringBlocks(buffer2, buffer3));Di2015NewLine            Task stage2d = f.StartNew(() => ParseStringBlocks(buffer2, buffer3));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task stage3a = f.StartNew(() => UploadBlocks(buffer3) );Di2015NewLine            Task stage3b = f.StartNew(() => UploadBlocks(buffer3) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task.WaitAll(stage0, stage1, stage2a, stage2b, stage2c, stage2d, stage3a, stage3b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Adds the filenames to process into the first pipelineDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="output"></param>Di2015NewLine        private static void PopulateFilesList( BlockingCollection<string> output )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buffer1.Add("file1.txt");Di2015NewLine                buffer1.Add("file2.txt");Di2015NewLine                //...Di2015NewLine                buffer1.Add("lastFile.txt");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Takes filnames out of the first pipeline, reads them into string[] blocks, and puts them in the second pipelineDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void ReadFiles( BlockingCollection<string> input, BlockingCollection<string[]> output)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (string file in input.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<string> list = new List<string>(MaxBlockSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(file))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int countLines = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        while (!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            list.Add( sr.ReadLine() );Di2015NewLine                            countLines++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (countLines > MaxBlockSize)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                output.Add(list.ToArray());Di2015NewLine                                countLines = 0;Di2015NewLine                                list = new List<string>(MaxBlockSize);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (list.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            output.Add(list.ToArray());Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Takes string[] blocks from the second pipeline, for each line, splits them by tabs, and parsesDi2015NewLine        /// the data, storing each line as an object array into the third pipline.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void ParseStringBlocks( BlockingCollection<string[]> input, BlockingCollection< Object[][] > output)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<Object[]> result = new List<object[]>(MaxBlockSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (string[] block in input.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (string line in block)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string[] splitLine = line.Split('\\t'); //split line on tabDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        string cityName = splitLine[0];Di2015NewLine                        int cityPop = Int32.Parse( splitLine[1] );Di2015NewLine                        int cityElevation = Int32.Parse(splitLine[2]);Di2015NewLine                        //...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        result.Add(new Object[] { cityName, cityPop, cityElevation });Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    output.Add( result.ToArray() );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Takes the data blocks from the third pipeline, and uploads each row to SQL DatabaseDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void UploadBlocks(BlockingCollection<Object[][]> input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine             * At this point 'block' is an array of object arrays.Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * The block contains MaxBlockSize number of cities.Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * There is one object array for each city.Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * The object array for the city is in the pre-defined order from pipeline stage2Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * You could do a couple of things at this point:Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * 1. declare and initialize a DataTable with the correct column typesDi2015NewLine             *    then, do the  dataTable.Rows.Add( rowValues )Di2015NewLine             *    then, use a Bulk Copy Operation to upload the dataTable to SQLDi2015NewLine             *    http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/7ek5da1aDi2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * 2. Manually perform the sql commands/transactions similar to what Di2015NewLine             *    Kevin recommends in this suggestion:Di2015NewLine             *    http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1024123/sql-insert-one-row-or-multiple-rows-data/1024195#1024195Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * I've demonstrated the first approach with this code.Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataTable dataTable = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set up columns of dataTable here.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Object[][] block in input.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (Object[] rowValues in block)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    dataTable.Rows.Add(rowValues);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //do bulkCopy to upload table containing MaxBlockSize number of cities right here.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dataTable.Rows.Clear(); //Remove the rows when you are done uploading, but not the dataTable.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11923167Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<object[]> Select() {Di2015NewLine    string query = "SELECT * FROM tableinfo";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a list to store the resultDi2015NewLine    var result = new List<object[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open connectionDi2015NewLine    if (this.OpenConnection()) {Di2015NewLine        // Create CommandDi2015NewLine        var cmd = new MySqlCommand(query, connection);Di2015NewLine        // Create a data reader and Execute the commandDi2015NewLine        MySqlDataReader dataReader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read the data and store them in the listDi2015NewLine        while(dataReader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine            object[] items = new object[dataReader.FieldCount];Di2015NewLine            dataReader.GetValues(items);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(items);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Close Data ReaderDi2015NewLine        dataReader.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Close ConnectionDi2015NewLine        this.CloseConnection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return list to be displayedDi2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        // This is a bad thing.Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("Could not connect to database.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11927170Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string[] FindAllFiles(string rootDir) {Di2015NewLine        var pathsToSearch = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine        var foundFiles = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pathsToSearch.Enqueue(rootDir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (pathsToSearch.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine            var dir = pathsToSearch.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                var files = Directory.GetFiles(dir);Di2015NewLine                foreach (var file in Directory.GetFiles(dir)) {Di2015NewLine                    foundFiles.Add(file);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var subDir in Directory.GetDirectories(dir)) {Di2015NewLine                    pathsToSearch.Enqueue(subDir);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            } catch (Exception /* TODO: catch correct exception */) {Di2015NewLine                // Swallow.  Gulp!Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return foundFiles.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11928952Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string EncryptString(string val)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SqlConnection sqlconn = new SqlConnection("conn_string");Di2015NewLine                sqlconn.Open();Di2015NewLine                SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand();Di2015NewLine                cmd.Connection = sqlconn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cmd.CommandText = "ng_encryptString"; // This is the sproc which will encrypt the stringDi2015NewLine                cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SqlParameter param1 = cmd.Parameters.Add("inpuStr", SqlDbType.VarChar, 500);Di2015NewLine                param1.Direction = ParameterDirection.Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SqlParameter param3 = cmd.Parameters.Add("@encryptedStr", SqlDbType.VarChar, 2000);Di2015NewLine                param3.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                param1.Value = val;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                sqlconn.Close();Di2015NewLine                return (string)param3.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine
11928952Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE Procedure [dbo].[ng_encryptString]  Di2015NewLine@string varchar(255),  Di2015NewLine@encryptedStr varbinary(2000)  OUTPUT  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAs  Di2015NewLineBegin  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDeclare @res varbinary(2000)  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF NOT EXISTS(select * from sys.symmetric_keys where name='##MS_DatabaseMasterKey##')  Di2015NewLineCREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION  Di2015NewLineBY PASSWORD = 'yourpassword'  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF NOT EXISTS(select * from sys.certificates where name='EncryptTestCert')  Di2015NewLineCREATE CERTIFICATE EncryptTestCert  Di2015NewLineWITH SUBJECT = 'yoursubject'  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF NOT EXISTS(select * from sys.symmetric_keys where name='TestTableKey')   Di2015NewLineCREATE SYMMETRIC KEY TestTableKey  Di2015NewLineWITH ALGORITHM = TRIPLE_DES ENCRYPTION  Di2015NewLineBY CERTIFICATE EncryptTestCert  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineOPEN SYMMETRIC KEY TestTableKey DECRYPTION  Di2015NewLineBY CERTIFICATE EncryptTestCert  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @encryptedStr=ENCRYPTBYKEY(KEY_GUID('TestTableKey'),@string)  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineend  Di2015NewLine

11948573Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar predicate = Expression.GreaterThan(Di2015NewLine    Expression.MakeMemberAccess(variable, sourceType.GetProperty("Number")),Di2015NewLine    Expression.Constant(10));Di2015NewLine
11948573Di2015UniqueSeparator// Maps operators to Expression factory methodsDi2015NewLinevar dict = new Dictionary<string, Func<Expression, Expression, BinaryExpression>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    { "==", Expression.Equal },Di2015NewLine    { ">", Expression.GreaterThan },Di2015NewLine    { "<", Expression.LessThan },Di2015NewLine    // etcDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar predicate = Expression.Constant(true); // by default accept all rowsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Logical AND everything in parseResult to construct the final predicateDi2015NewLineforeach (parseResult in parsedUserInput)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var exprConstructor = dict[parseResult.Operator];Di2015NewLine    var property = sourceType.GetProperty(parseResult.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine    var target = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(variable, property);Di2015NewLine    var additionalTest = exprConstructor(target, Expression.Constant(parseResult.Value));Di2015NewLine    predicate = Expression.AndAlso(predicate, additionalTest);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11948758Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetPageSource(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string htmlSource = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Net.WebProxy myProxy = new System.Net.WebProxy("Proxy IP", 8080);Di2015NewLine        using (System.Net.WebClient client = new System.Net.WebClient())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            client.Proxy = myProxy;Di2015NewLine            client.Proxy.Credentials = new System.Net.NetworkCredential("username", "password");Di2015NewLine            htmlSource = client.DownloadString(url);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // log any exceptionsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return htmlSource;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11948998Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct FractionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Numerator;Di2015NewLine    public int Denominator;Di2015NewLine    public static Fraction Zero = new Fraction(0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction(int numerator, int denominator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Numerator = numerator;Di2015NewLine        this.Denominator = denominator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //If denominator negative...Di2015NewLine        if (this.Denominator < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //...move the negative up to the numeratorDi2015NewLine            this.Numerator = -this.Numerator;Di2015NewLine            this.Denominator = -this.Denominator;                        Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction(int numerator, Fraction denominator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //divide the numerator by the denominator fractionDi2015NewLine        this = new Fraction(numerator, 1) / denominator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction(Fraction numerator, int denominator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //multiply the numerator fraction by 1 over the denominatorDi2015NewLine        this = numerator * new Fraction(1, denominator);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction(Fraction fraction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Numerator = fraction.Numerator;Di2015NewLine        this.Denominator = fraction.Denominator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int getGCD(int a, int b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Drop negative signsDi2015NewLine        a = Math.Abs(a);Di2015NewLine        b = Math.Abs(b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Return the greatest common denominator between two integersDi2015NewLine        while (a != 0 && b != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (a > b)Di2015NewLine                a %= b;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                b %= a;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (a == 0)Di2015NewLine            return b;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return a;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int getLCD(int a, int b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Return the Least Common Denominator between two integersDi2015NewLine        return (a * b) / getGCD(a, b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction ToDenominator(int targetDenominator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Multiply the fraction by a factor to make the denominatorDi2015NewLine        //match the target denominatorDi2015NewLine        Fraction modifiedFraction = this;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Cannot reduce to smaller denominatorsDi2015NewLine        if (targetDenominator < this.Denominator)Di2015NewLine            return modifiedFraction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //The target denominator must be a factor of the current denominatorDi2015NewLine        if (targetDenominator % this.Denominator != 0)Di2015NewLine            return modifiedFraction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.Denominator != targetDenominator)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int factor = targetDenominator / this.Denominator;Di2015NewLine            modifiedFraction.Denominator = targetDenominator;Di2015NewLine            modifiedFraction.Numerator *= factor;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return modifiedFraction;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction GetReduced()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Reduce the fraction to lowest termsDi2015NewLine        Fraction modifiedFraction = this;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //While the numerator and denominator share a greatest common denominator,Di2015NewLine        //keep dividing both by itDi2015NewLine        int gcd = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (Math.Abs(gcd = getGCD(modifiedFraction.Numerator, modifiedFraction.Denominator)) != 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            modifiedFraction.Numerator /= gcd;Di2015NewLine            modifiedFraction.Denominator /= gcd;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make sure only a single negative sign is on the numeratorDi2015NewLine        if (modifiedFraction.Denominator < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            modifiedFraction.Numerator = -this.Numerator;Di2015NewLine            modifiedFraction.Denominator = -this.Denominator;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return modifiedFraction;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Fraction GetReciprocal()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Flip the numerator and the denominatorDi2015NewLine        return new Fraction(this.Denominator, this.Numerator);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Fraction operator +(Fraction fraction1, Fraction fraction2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Check if either fraction is zeroDi2015NewLine        if (fraction1.Denominator == 0)Di2015NewLine            return fraction2;Di2015NewLine        else if (fraction2.Denominator == 0)Di2015NewLine            return fraction1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get Least Common DenominatorDi2015NewLine        int lcd = getLCD(fraction1.Denominator, fraction2.Denominator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Transform the fractionsDi2015NewLine        fraction1 = fraction1.ToDenominator(lcd);Di2015NewLine        fraction2 = fraction2.ToDenominator(lcd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Return sumDi2015NewLine        return new Fraction(fraction1.Numerator + fraction2.Numerator, lcd).GetReduced();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Fraction operator -(Fraction fraction1, Fraction fraction2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Get Least Common DenominatorDi2015NewLine        int lcd = getLCD(fraction1.Denominator, fraction2.Denominator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Transform the fractionsDi2015NewLine        fraction1 = fraction1.ToDenominator(lcd);Di2015NewLine        fraction2 = fraction2.ToDenominator(lcd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Return differenceDi2015NewLine        return new Fraction(fraction1.Numerator - fraction2.Numerator, lcd).GetReduced();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Fraction operator *(Fraction fraction1, Fraction fraction2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int numerator = fraction1.Numerator * fraction2.Numerator;Di2015NewLine        int denomenator = fraction1.Denominator * fraction2.Denominator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Fraction(numerator, denomenator).GetReduced();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Fraction operator /(Fraction fraction1, Fraction fraction2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Fraction(fraction1 * fraction2.GetReciprocal()).GetReduced();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double ToDouble()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (double)this.Numerator / this.Denominator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Numerator + "/" + Denominator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11949061Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ImmutableCollection<T> : ReadOnlyCollection<T> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ImmutableCollection(IEnumerable<T> source) : base(source.ToList()) {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11949061Di2015UniqueSeparator  public bool Contains(IEnumerable<T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine   return IndicesOf(pattern).Any();Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public int IndexOf(IEnumerable<T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine   return IndicesOf(pattern).Select(x=>(int?)x).FirstOrDefault() ?? -1;Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public int LastIndexOf(IEnumerable<T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine   return IndicesOf(pattern).Select(x=>(int?)x).LastOrDefault()?? -1;Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public IEnumerable<int> IndicesOf(IEnumerable <T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine  var count=pattern.Count();Di2015NewLine  return Enumerable.Range(0,this.Count()-count).Where(i=> pattern.SequenceEqual(internalTake(i,count)));Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public IEnumerable<int> LastIndicesOf(IEnumerable<T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine   return IndicesOf(pattern).Reverse(); // Could OptimizeDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine private IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> internalSplit(IEnumerable<T> seperator) {Di2015NewLine   var splitPoints=this.IndicesOf(seperator);Di2015NewLine   var length=seperator.Count();Di2015NewLine   var lastCount=0;Di2015NewLine   foreach(var point in splitPoints.Where(x=>!splitPoints.Any(y=>y<x && y+length>x))) {Di2015NewLine        yield return this.Take(lastCount,point-lastCount);Di2015NewLine        lastCount=point+length;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   yield return this.TakeAll(lastCount);Di2015NewLine } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public ImmutableCollection<T>[] Split(IEnumerable<T> seperator) {Di2015NewLine   return internalSplit(seperator).Select(x=>new ImmutableCollection<T>(x)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine }          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public bool StartsWith(IEnumerable<T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine    return pattern.SequenceEqual(this.Take(pattern.Count()));Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLine public bool EndsWith(IEnumerable<T> pattern) {Di2015NewLine    return pattern.SequenceEqual(this.Skip(this.Count()-pattern.Count()));Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine private IEnumerable<T> internalTake(int startIndex, int length) {Di2015NewLine    var max=(length==-1) ? this.Count() : Math.Min(this.Count(),startIndex+length);Di2015NewLine    for (int i=startIndex;i<max;i++) yield return this[i];Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public ImmutableCollection<T> Take(int startIndex, int length) {Di2015NewLine    return new ImmutableCollection<T>(internalTake(startIndex,length));Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public ImmutableCollection<T> TakeAll(int startIndex) {Di2015NewLine    return new ImmutableCollection<T>(internalTake(startIndex,-1));Di2015NewLine }           Di2015NewLine

11950632Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MultiLevelDistinctEntityTransformer : IResultTransformerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Type, List<String>> _fetchedCollectionProperties; // used to know which properties are fetched so you don't fetch more details than requiredDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MultiLevelDistinctEntityTransformer(Dictionary<Type, List<String>> fetchedCollectionProperties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _fetchedCollectionProperties = fetchedCollectionProperties;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object TransformTuple(object[] tuple, string[] aliases)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return tuple.Last();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IList TransformList(IList list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (list.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            return list;Di2015NewLine        var result = (IList) Activator.CreateInstance(list.GetType());Di2015NewLine        var distinctSet = new HashSet<Entity>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (object item in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var entity = item as Entity; // Entity is the base class of my nhibernate classesDi2015NewLine            if (entity == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            if (distinctSet.Add(entity))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                HandleItemDetails(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void HandleItemDetails(object item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> collectionProperties =Di2015NewLine            item.GetType().GetProperties().Where(Di2015NewLine                prop =>Di2015NewLine                prop.IsCollectionProperty()/*extension method which checks if the object inherits from ICollection*/ &&Di2015NewLine                _fetchedCollectionProperties.ContainsKey(item.GetType()) &&// get only the fetched detailsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _fetchedCollectionProperties[item.GetType()].Contains(prop.Name));Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo collectionProperty in collectionProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dynamic detailList = collectionProperty.GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLine            if (detailList != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dynamic uniqueValues =Di2015NewLine                    Activator.CreateInstance(Di2015NewLine                        typeof (List<>).MakeGenericType(collectionProperty.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments()[0]));Di2015NewLine                var distinct = new HashSet<Entity>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var subItem in detailList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var entity = subItem as Entity;Di2015NewLine                    if (distinct.Add(entity))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        uniqueValues.Add(subItem);Di2015NewLine                        HandleItemDetails(subItem);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                collectionProperty.SetValue(item, uniqueValues, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11953256Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddNodeToDb(IGraphClient graphClient, string index, RootWord word, RootWord synonym)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!graphClient.CheckIndexExists(index, IndexFor.Node))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var configuration = new IndexConfiguration { Provider = IndexProvider.lucene, Type = IndexType.fulltext };Di2015NewLine        graphClient.CreateIndex(index, configuration, IndexFor.Node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var wordReference = graphClient.Create(word, null, GetIndexEntries(word, index));Di2015NewLine    var synonymReference = graphClient.Create(synonym, null, GetIndexEntries(synonym, index));Di2015NewLine    graphClient.CreateRelationship(wordReference, new IsSynonym(synonymReference));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Word: {0}, Synonym: {1}", wordReference.Id, synonymReference.Id);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11953256Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<IndexEntry> GetIndexEntries(RootWord rootWord, string indexName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var indexKeyValues =Di2015NewLine        new List<KeyValuePair<string, object>>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new KeyValuePair<string, object>("term", rootWord.Term)Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new[]Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                   new IndexEntryDi2015NewLine                       {Di2015NewLine                           Name = indexName,Di2015NewLine                           KeyValues = indexKeyValues.Where(v => v.Value != null)Di2015NewLine                       }Di2015NewLine               };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11953256Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void QueryTerms(IGraphClient gc, string query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = gc.QueryIndex<RootWord>("synonyms", IndexFor.Node, "term:" + query).ToList();Di2015NewLine    if (result.Any())Di2015NewLine        foreach (var node in result)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("node: {0} -> {1}", node.Reference.Id, node.Data.Term);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("No results...");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

        Console.WriteLine("The wheels of car are rolling");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class newmodel : carDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine rocking");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine model");Di2015NewLine                char c = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                switch (c)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case                    case 'n':Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            currentcar = new newmodel();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine 11953734Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass IntPropertyConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this converter can be applied to any typeDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we currently support only writing of JSONDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(writer, null);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find all properties with type 'int'Di2015NewLine        var properties = value.GetType().GetProperties().Where(p => p.PropertyType == typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // write property nameDi2015NewLine            writer.WritePropertyName(property.Name);Di2015NewLine            // let the serializer serialize the value itselfDi2015NewLine            // (so this converter will work with any other type, not just int)Di2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(writer, property.GetValue(value, null));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11955164Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, Pack = 8)]Di2015NewLinepublic struct MLocationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int x;Di2015NewLine    public int y;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MLocation test = new MLocation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets size of struct in bytesDi2015NewLine    int structureSize = Marshal.SizeOf(test);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Builds byte arrayDi2015NewLine    byte[] byteArray = new byte[structureSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IntPtr memPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Allocate some unmanaged memoryDi2015NewLine        memPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(structureSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy struct to unmanaged memoryDi2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(test, memPtr, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copies to byte arrayDi2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(memPtr, byteArray, 0, structureSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (memPtr != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(memPtr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now you can send your byte array through TCPDi2015NewLine    using (TcpClient client = new TcpClient("host", 8080))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11956892Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<string> Rangify(IList<int> input) {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < input.Count; ) {Di2015NewLine        var start = input[i];Di2015NewLine        int size = 1;Di2015NewLine        while (++i < input.Count && input[i] == start + size)Di2015NewLine            size++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (size == 1)Di2015NewLine            yield return start.ToString();Di2015NewLine        else if (size == 2) {Di2015NewLine            yield return start.ToString();Di2015NewLine            yield return (start + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLine        } else if (size > 2)Di2015NewLine            yield return start + " - " + (start + size - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11956929Di2015UniqueSeparatorIObservable
11956929Di2015UniqueSeparator0 on observer 1Di2015NewLine0 on observer 2Di2015NewLine1 on observer 1Di2015NewLine1 on observer 2Di2015NewLineetc.Di2015NewLine
11956929Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int maxValue = rnd.Next(20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Zip with Observable.Interval to introduce a delay */Di2015NewLine    IObservable<int> mainEngine = Observable.Range(0, maxValue, Scheduler.NewThread)Di2015NewLine        .Zip(Observable.Interval(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(100)), (a, b) => a);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Publish the observable to share a subscription between observers */Di2015NewLine    IConnectableObservable<int> published = mainEngine.Publish();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Subscribe the first observer immediately, events are not yet being observed */Di2015NewLine    published.Subscribe(onNext: (item) => { Console.WriteLine(item + " on observer 1"); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Start pushing events to the first observer */Di2015NewLine    published.Connect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Wait one second and then subscribe the second observer */Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine    published.Subscribe(onNext: (item) => { Console.WriteLine(item + " on observer 2"); });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11958472Di2015UniqueSeparator    ''' <summary>Di2015NewLine    ''' Search and Find Registry FunctionDi2015NewLine    ''' </summary>Di2015NewLine    Public Shared Function SearchRegistry(ByVal dllName As String) As StringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'Open the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\\CLSID which contains the list of all registered COM files (.ocx,.dll, .ax) Di2015NewLine        'on the system no matters if is 32 or 64 bits.Di2015NewLine        Dim t_clsidKey As RegistryKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey("CLSID")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'Get all the sub keys it contains, wich are the generated GUID of each COM.Di2015NewLine        For Each subKey In t_clsidKey.GetSubKeyNames.ToListDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            'For each CLSID\\GUID key we get the InProcServer32 sub-key .Di2015NewLine            Dim t_clsidSubKey As RegistryKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey("CLSID\\" & subKey & "\\InProcServer32")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            If Not t_clsidSubKey Is Nothing ThenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                'in the case InProcServer32 exist we get the default value wich contains the path of the COM file.Di2015NewLine                Dim t_valueName As String = (From value In t_clsidSubKey.GetValueNames() Where value = "")(0).ToStringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                'Now gets the value.Di2015NewLine                Dim t_value As String = t_clsidSubKey.GetValue(t_valueName).ToStringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                'And finaly if the value ends with the name of the dll (include .dll) we return itDi2015NewLine                If t_value.EndsWith(dllName) ThenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Return t_valueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'if not exist, return nothingDi2015NewLine        Return NothingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine
11958472Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Search and Find Registry FunctionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static string SearchRegistry(string dllName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Open the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\\CLSID which contains the list of all registered COM files (.ocx,.dll, .ax) Di2015NewLine        //on the system no matters if is 32 or 64 bits.Di2015NewLine        RegistryKey t_clsidKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey("CLSID");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get all the sub keys it contains, wich are the generated GUID of each COM.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (object subKey_loopVariable in t_clsidKey.GetSubKeyNames.ToList) {Di2015NewLine            subKey = subKey_loopVariable;Di2015NewLine            //For each CLSID\\GUID key we get the InProcServer32 sub-key .Di2015NewLine            RegistryKey t_clsidSubKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey("CLSID\\\\" + subKey + "\\\\InProcServer32");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((t_clsidSubKey != null)) {Di2015NewLine                //in the case InProcServer32 exist we get the default value wich contains the path of the COM file.Di2015NewLine                string t_valueName = (from value in t_clsidSubKey.GetValueNames()where string.IsNullOrEmpty(value))(0).ToString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Now gets the value.Di2015NewLine                string t_value = t_clsidSubKey.GetValue(t_valueName).ToString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //And finaly if the value ends with the name of the dll (include .dll) we return itDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (t_value.EndsWith(dllName)) {Di2015NewLine                    return t_value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //if not exist, return nothingDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11960236Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Batch<T>(IEnumerable<T> collection, Di2015NewLine                                                   int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> nextbatch = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in collection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        nextbatch.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        if (nextbatch.Count == batchSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return nextbatch;Di2015NewLine            nextbatch = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (nextbatch.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return nextbatch;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11963618Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Linq.Expressions
11963618Di2015UniqueSeparatorinvestments
11963618Di2015UniqueSeparator_performance
11963618Di2015UniqueSeparator_investments
11963618Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IQueryable<Investment> PerformanceSearch(Expression<Func<Performance, double>> searchColumn, double minValue, double maxValue) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // LINQ Expression that represents the column passed in searchColumnDi2015NewLine        // x.Return1MonthDi2015NewLine        MemberExpression columnExpression = searchColumn.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // LINQ Expression to represent the parameter of the lambda you pass inDi2015NewLine        // xDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameterExpression = (ParameterExpression)columnExpression.Expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expressions to represent min and max valuesDi2015NewLine        Expression minValueExpression = Expression.Constant(minValue);Di2015NewLine        Expression maxValueExpression = Expression.Constant(maxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Expressions to represent the boolean operatorsDi2015NewLine        // x.Return1Month >= minValueDi2015NewLine        Expression minComparisonExpression = Expression.GreaterThanOrEqual(columnExpression, minValueExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // x.Return1Month <= maxValueDi2015NewLine        Expression maxComparisonExpression = Expression.LessThanOrEqual(columnExpression, maxValueExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // (x.Return1Month >= minValue) && (x.Return1Month <= maxValue)Di2015NewLine        Expression filterExpression = Expression.AndAlso(minComparisonExpression, maxComparisonExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // x => (x.Return1Month >= minValue) && (x.Return1Month <= maxValue)Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Performance, bool>> filterLambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<Performance, bool>>(filterExpression, parameterExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use the completed expression to filter your collectionDi2015NewLine        // This requires that your collection is an IQueryable.Di2015NewLine        // I believe that EF tables are already IQueryable, so you can probablyDi2015NewLine        // drop the .AsQueryable calls and it will still work fine.Di2015NewLine        var query = (from i in _investmentsDi2015NewLine                     join p in _performance.AsQueryable().Where(filterLambdaExpression)Di2015NewLine                       on i.InvestmentId equals p.InvestmentIdDi2015NewLine                     select i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine

11965687Di2015UniqueSeparator// Returns the human-readable file size for an arbitrary, 64-bit file sizeDi2015NewLine//  The default format is "0.### XB", e.g. "4.2 KB" or "1.434 GB"Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetSizeReadable(long i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string sign = (i < 0 ? "-" : "");Di2015NewLine    double readable = (i < 0 ? -i : i);Di2015NewLine    string suffix;Di2015NewLine    if (i >= 0x1000000000000000) // ExabyteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        suffix = "EB";Di2015NewLine        readable = (double)(i >> 50);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (i >= 0x4000000000000) // PetabyteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        suffix = "PB";Di2015NewLine        readable = (double)(i >> 40);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (i >= 0x10000000000) // TerabyteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        suffix = "TB";Di2015NewLine        readable = (double)(i >> 30);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (i >= 0x40000000) // GigabyteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        suffix = "GB";Di2015NewLine        readable = (double)(i >> 20);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (i >= 0x100000) // MegabyteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        suffix = "MB";Di2015NewLine        readable = (double)(i >> 10);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (i >= 0x400) // KilobyteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        suffix = "KB";Di2015NewLine        readable = (double)i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return i.ToString(sign + "0 B"); // ByteDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    readable = readable / 1024;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sign + readable.ToString("0.### ") + suffix;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11965687Di2015UniqueSeparator// EXAMPLE OUTPUTDi2015NewLineGetSizeReadable(1023); // 1023 BDi2015NewLineGetSizeReadable(1024); // 1 KBDi2015NewLineGetSizeReadable(1025); // 1.001 KBDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Example of getting a file size and converting it to a readable valueDi2015NewLinestring fileName = "abc.txt";Di2015NewLinelong fileSize = new System.IO.FileInfo(fileName).Length;Di2015NewLinestring sizeReadable = GetSizeReadable(fileSize);Di2015NewLine

11966987Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate StreamReader sr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void OutputBtn_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(var li in lb.Items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PrintDocument PrintD = new PrintDocument();Di2015NewLine        PrintD.PrintPage += new PrintPageEventHandler(this.PrintDocument_PrintPage);Di2015NewLine        sr = new StreamReader(li.ToString());Di2015NewLine        PrintD.Print();        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void PrintDocument_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs ev) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     float linesPerPage = 0;Di2015NewLine     float yPos =  0;Di2015NewLine     int count = 0;Di2015NewLine     float leftMargin = ev.MarginBounds.Left;Di2015NewLine     float topMargin = ev.MarginBounds.Top;Di2015NewLine     String line = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Calculate the number of lines per page.Di2015NewLine     linesPerPage = ev.MarginBounds.Height  / Di2015NewLine        printFont.GetHeight(ev.Graphics) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Iterate over the file, printing each line.Di2015NewLine     while (count < linesPerPage && ((line = sr.ReadLine()) != null)) Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        yPos = topMargin + (count * printFont.GetHeight(ev.Graphics));Di2015NewLine        ev.Graphics.DrawString (line, printFont, Brushes.Black, Di2015NewLine           leftMargin, yPos, new StringFormat());Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // If more lines exist, print another page.Di2015NewLine     if (line != null) Di2015NewLine        ev.HasMorePages = true;Di2015NewLine     else Di2015NewLine        ev.HasMorePages = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11969067Di2015UniqueSeparatorDigitalez.DirectoryUtil.EnsureDirectoryExists(relativePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string filePath = System.IO.Path.Combine(relativePath, fileInfo.Name);Di2015NewLine        long length = Digitalez.FtpUtil.GetFileLength(fileInfo.FullPath, userName, password, usePassive);Di2015NewLine        long offset = 0;Di2015NewLine        int retryCount = 10;Di2015NewLine        int? readTimeout = 5 * 60 * 1000; //five minutesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if the file exists, do not download itDi2015NewLine        if (System.IO.File.Exists(filePath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (retryCount > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          using (System.IO.Stream responseStream = Captator.Eifos.Net.FtpUtil.GetFileAsStream(fileInfo.FullPath, userName, password, usePassive, offset, requestTimeout: readTimeout != null ? readTimeout.Value : System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (System.IO.FileStream fileStream = new System.IO.FileStream(filePath, System.IO.FileMode.Append))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine              tryDi2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                int bytesRead = responseStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (bytesRead > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                  fileStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  bytesRead = responseStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              catch (System.Net.WebException)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                // Do nothing - consume this exception to force a new read of the rest of the fileDi2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (System.IO.File.Exists(filePath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              offset = new System.IO.FileInfo(filePath).Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              offset = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            retryCount--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (offset == length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

An enum should inherit from System.Enum */Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _value; /* Should be marked to be treated specially */Di2015NewLine    private MyTest(int value) /* Doesn't need to exist, since there's some CLR fiddling */Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       _value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static explicit operator int(MyTest value) /* CLR provides conversions automatically */Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       return value._value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static explicit operator MyTest(int value) /* CLR provides conversions automatically */Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       return new MyTest(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly MyTest A = new MyTest(1); /* Should be const, not readonly, but we can't do a const of a custom type in C#. Also, is magically implicitly converted without calling a constructor */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly MyTest B = new MyTest(2); /* Ditto */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11970604Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLinepublic ActionResult Edit(MyItemViewModel vm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the domain model that we want to updateDi2015NewLine    MyItem item = Repository.GetItem(vm.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Merge the properties of the domain model from the view model =>Di2015NewLine    // update only those that were present in the view modelDi2015NewLine    Mapper.Map<MyItemViewModel, MyItem>(vm, item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // At this stage the item instance contains update propertiesDi2015NewLine    // for those that were present in the view model and all otherDi2015NewLine    // stay untouched. 11971839Di2015UniqueSeparator// setting the layout to sequential will prevent the compiler/JITDi2015NewLine// to reorder the struct fieldsDi2015NewLine// NOTE: Observe here that the Charset used is Ansi. You may need toDi2015NewLine// change this depending on the format expected by the receiver.Di2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet = CharSet.Ansi)]Di2015NewLinestruct DataPacketDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine    public uint Id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // As I understood from your question, the Name fieldDi2015NewLine    // has a prefixed size of 40 bytes. Attention here:Di2015NewLine    // the SizeConst actually means '40 characters', not bytesDi2015NewLine    // If you choose to use the Unicode charset, set SizeConst = 20Di2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValTStr, SizeConst = 40)]Di2015NewLine    public String Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This will be serialized in little endian formatDi2015NewLine    // in your question this field is 8 bytes long, which Di2015NewLine    // in c# corresponds to the double type. If you really meanDi2015NewLine    // the float type (4 bytes), change here.Di2015NewLine    public double Grade;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calling this method will return a byte array with the contentsDi2015NewLine    // of the struct ready to be sent via the tcp socket.Di2015NewLine    public byte[] Serialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // allocate a byte array for the struct dataDi2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(DataPacket))];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Allocate a GCHandle and get the array pointerDi2015NewLine        var gch = GCHandle.Alloc(buffer, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        var pBuffer = gch.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // copy data from struct to array and unpin the gc pointerDi2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(this, pBuffer, false);Di2015NewLine        gch.Free();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this method will deserialize a byte array into the struct.Di2015NewLine    public void Deserialize(ref byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var gch = GCHandle.Alloc(data, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        this = (DataPacket)Marshal.PtrToStructure(gch.AddrOfPinnedObject(), typeof(DataPacket));Di2015NewLine        gch.Free();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11971839Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataPacket packet;Di2015NewLinepacket.Id = 1234;Di2015NewLinepacket.Name = "Marvin the paranoid robot";Di2015NewLinepacket.Grade = 9.2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// serializeDi2015NewLinevar bytes = packet.Serialize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// send via tcpDi2015NewLinevar tcp = new TcpClient(...); Di2015NewLinetcp.GetStream().Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// deserializing;Di2015NewLineDataPacket receivedPacket;Di2015NewLinereceivedPacket.deserialize(bytes);Di2015NewLine

11972198Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToShortString(this int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n >= 1e8)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Math.Round((double)n / 1e6, 0)).ToString() + "M";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (n >= 1e7)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Math.Round((double)n / 1e6, 1)).ToString() + "M";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (n >= 1e6)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Math.Round((double)n / 1e6, 2)).ToString() + "M";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (n >= 1e5)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Math.Round((double)n / 1e3, 0)).ToString() + "K";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (n >= 1e4)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Math.Round((double)n / 1e3, 1)).ToString() + "K";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (n >= 1e3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return n.ToString("##,#");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return n.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11977621Di2015UniqueSeparator// retrieves the maximum number of characters that can be decrypted at onceDi2015NewLineprivate int getMaxBlockSize(int keySize){Di2015NewLine    int max = ((int)(keysize/8/3) )* 4Di2015NewLine    if (keySize / 8 mod 3 != 0){Di2015NewLine        max += 4Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return max;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string decrypt(string msg, string containerName){Di2015NewLine    CspParameters params = new CspParameters();Di2015NewLine    params.KeyContainerName = containerName;Di2015NewLine    RSACryptoServiceProvider rsa = new RSACryptoServiceProvider(params);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder decryptedMsg = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int maxDecryptSize = getMaxBlockSize(rsa.KeySize);Di2015NewLine    int iterationCount = Math.Floor(msg.length / maxDecryptSize)Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i<iterationCount; i++){Di2015NewLine        int start = i * maxDecryptSize;Di2015NewLine        int blkSize = Math.min(start + maxDecryptSize, msg.Length);Di2015NewLine        Byte[] msgBytes = System.Convert.FromBase64String(msg.Substring(start, blkSize));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        decryptedMsg.Append(System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetString(RSAProvider.Decrypt(msgBytes, false));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return decryptedMsg.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11979287Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine//var data = Enumerable.Range(0, 10).ToArray();Di2015NewLinevar data = Enumerable.Range(0, 10).Select(x => rnd.Next(1 << 13)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var n in data) Console.WriteLine(n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(new string('-', 13));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar bits = new BitArray(data.Length * 13);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var intBits = new BitArray(new[] { data[i] });Di2015NewLine    for (int b = 12; b > -1; b--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bits[i * 13 + b] = intBits[b];Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(intBits[b] ? 1 : 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(new string('-', 13));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < bits.Length / 13; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int number = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int b = 12; b > -1; b--)Di2015NewLine        if (bits[i * 13 + b])Di2015NewLine            number += 1 << b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(number);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineConsole.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine
11979287Di2015UniqueSeparator910Di2015NewLine3934Di2015NewLine7326Di2015NewLine7990Di2015NewLine7712Di2015NewLine1178Di2015NewLine6380Di2015NewLine3460Di2015NewLine5113Di2015NewLine7489Di2015NewLine-------------Di2015NewLine0001110001110Di2015NewLine0111101011110Di2015NewLine1110010011110Di2015NewLine1111100110110Di2015NewLine1111000100000Di2015NewLine0010010011010Di2015NewLine1100011101100Di2015NewLine0110110000100Di2015NewLine1001111111001Di2015NewLine1110101000001Di2015NewLine-------------Di2015NewLine910Di2015NewLine3934Di2015NewLine7326Di2015NewLine7990Di2015NewLine7712Di2015NewLine1178Di2015NewLine6380Di2015NewLine3460Di2015NewLine5113Di2015NewLine7489Di2015NewLine
11979287Di2015UniqueSeparator//Improved to take sign into account.Di2015NewLine//Sign is in addition to bits allocated for storage in this version.Di2015NewLine//Stored as {sign}{bits}Di2015NewLine//E.g.  -5, stored in 3 bits signed is:Di2015NewLine//       1 101Di2015NewLine//E.g.   5, stored in 3 bits [with sign turned on]Di2015NewLine//       0 101Di2015NewLine//E.g.   5, stored in 3 bits no signDi2015NewLine//         101  Di2015NewLine//This may differ from your exiting format - e.g. you may use two's compliments.Di2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int bitsPerInt = 13;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create your dataDi2015NewLine    var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    //var data = Enumerable.Range(-5, 10).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var data = Enumerable.Range(0, 10).Select(x => rnd.Next(-(1 << bitsPerInt), 1 << bitsPerInt)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bits = new BitSerlializer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Add length headerDi2015NewLine    bits.AddInt(data.Length, 8, false);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var n in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bits.AddInt(n, bitsPerInt);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(n);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Serialize to bytes for network transfer etc.Di2015NewLine    var bytes = bits.ToBytes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(new string('-', 10));Di2015NewLine    foreach (var b in bytes) Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToString(b, 2).PadLeft(8, '0'));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(new string('-', 10));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //DeserializeDi2015NewLine    bits = new BitSerlializer(bytes);Di2015NewLine    //Get Length HeaderDi2015NewLine    var count = bits.ReadInt(8, false);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(bits.ReadInt(bitsPerInt));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BitSerlializerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<byte> bytes;Di2015NewLine    int Position { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BitSerlializer(byte[] initialData = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (initialData == null)Di2015NewLine            bytes = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            bytes = new List<byte>(initialData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte[] ToBytes() { return bytes.ToArray(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Addbit(bool val)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Position % 8 == 0) bytes.Add(0);Di2015NewLine        if (val) bytes[Position / 8] += (byte)(128 >> (Position % 8));Di2015NewLine        Position++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddInt(int i, int length, bool isSigned = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (isSigned) Addbit(i < 0);Di2015NewLine        if (i < 0) i = -i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int pos = --length; pos >= 0; pos--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var val = (i & (1 << pos)) != 0;Di2015NewLine            Addbit(val);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ReadBit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var val = (bytes[Position / 8] & (128 >> (Position % 8))) != 0;Di2015NewLine        ++Position;Di2015NewLine        return val;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ReadInt(int length, bool isSigned = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var val = 0;Di2015NewLine        var sign = isSigned && ReadBit() ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int pos = --length; pos >= 0; pos--)Di2015NewLine            if (ReadBit())Di2015NewLine                val += 1 << pos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return val * sign;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11982091Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CreateRandomString(int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    length -= 12; //12 digits are the counterDi2015NewLine    if (length <= 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("length");Di2015NewLine    long count = System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment(ref counter);Di2015NewLine    Byte[] randomBytes = new Byte[length * 3 / 4];Di2015NewLine    RNGCryptoServiceProvider rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    rng.GetBytes(randomBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine    buf[0] = (byte)count;Di2015NewLine    buf[1] = (byte)(count >> 8);Di2015NewLine    buf[2] = (byte)(count >> 16);Di2015NewLine    buf[3] = (byte)(count >> 24);Di2015NewLine    buf[4] = (byte)(count >> 32);Di2015NewLine    buf[5] = (byte)(count >> 40);Di2015NewLine    buf[6] = (byte)(count >> 48);Di2015NewLine    buf[7] = (byte)(count >> 56);Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(buf) + Convert.ToBase64String(randomBytes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11982180Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this IList<T> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptorCollection props =Di2015NewLine    TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0 ; i < props.Count ; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptor prop = props[i];Di2015NewLine    table.Columns.Add(prop.Name, prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object[] values = new object[props.Count];Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        values[i] = props[i].GetValue(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    table.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return table;        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11984785Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int RandomNumberEven(int min, int max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine            int ans = random.Next(min, max);Di2015NewLine            if (ans % 2 == 0) return ans;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (ans + 1 <= max)Di2015NewLine                    return ans + 1;Di2015NewLine                else if (ans - 1 >= min)Di2015NewLine                    return ans - 1;Di2015NewLine                else return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int RandomNumberOdd(int min, int max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine            int ans = random.Next(min, max);Di2015NewLine            if (ans % 2 == 1) return ans;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (ans + 1 <= max)Di2015NewLine                    return ans + 1;Di2015NewLine                else if (ans - 1 >= min)Di2015NewLine                    return ans - 1;Di2015NewLine                else return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11987876Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IEnumerable<int> ComputeMatrix(int[,] matrix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // check argsDi2015NewLine        if (matrix.Rank != 2) { throw new ArgumentException("matrix should have a rank of 2"); }Di2015NewLine        if (matrix.GetUpperBound(0) != matrix.GetUpperBound(1)) { throw new ArgumentException("matrix should have the same size");}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // indice treatedDi2015NewLine        List<int> treatedIndex = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= matrix.GetUpperBound(0); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (treatedIndex.Count == matrix.GetUpperBound(0)) Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // distance minimum between 2 pointsDi2015NewLine            int distanceMin = Int32.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // next iteration of indexDi2015NewLine            int nextI = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add the index to ignore in the next iterationDi2015NewLine            int nextJ = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j <= matrix.GetUpperBound(1); j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (treatedIndex.IndexOf(j) == -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (matrix[i, j] != 0 && matrix[i, j] < distanceMin)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        distanceMin = matrix[i, j];Di2015NewLine                        nextI = j;Di2015NewLine                        nextJ = i;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            i = nextI - 1;Di2015NewLine            treatedIndex.Add(nextJ);Di2015NewLine            yield return distanceMin;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11989404Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void MyTimer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        DateTime todayNow = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // For 11 AMDi2015NewLine        if (todayNow.Equals(new DateTime(todayNow.Year, todayNow.Month, todayNow.Day, 11, 00, 0)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyTimer.Stop(); // Stop the timer before you play the wav fileDi2015NewLine            PlaySound();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // For 11 30 AMDi2015NewLine        else if (todayNow.Equals(new DateTime(todayNow.Year, todayNow.Month, todayNow.Day, 11, 30, 0)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyTimer.Stop(); // Stop the timer before you play the wav fileDi2015NewLine            PlaySound();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // For 2 PMDi2015NewLine        else if (todayNow.Equals(new DateTime(todayNow.Year, todayNow.Month, todayNow.Day, 14, 00, 0)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyTimer.Stop(); // Stop the timer before you play the wav fileDi2015NewLine            PlaySound();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Once the Sound playing is over you can start the timer immediatelyDi2015NewLinevoid OnSoundPlayOverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   MyTimer.Start(); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11992866Di2015UniqueSeparatorControllerBuilder.Current.SetControllerFactory(new CustomControllerFactory(domainNamespaces));Di2015NewLine
11992866Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomControllerFactory : DefaultControllerFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<string, string> DomainNamespaces { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomControllerFactory(Dictionary<string, string> domainNamespaces)Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DomainNamespaces = domainNamespaces;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Type GetControllerType(RequestContext requestContext, string controllerName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        controllerName += controllerName.EndsWith("Controller", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) ? String.Empty : "Controller";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string requestDomain = requestContext.HttpContext.Request.Url.Host;Di2015NewLine        string defaultNamespace = "API.Controllers.Base";Di2015NewLine        string deploymentNamespace = "API.Controllers.Deployments." + DomainNamespaces[requestDomain];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assembly asm = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLine        Type deploymentMatch = null;Di2015NewLine        Type defaultMatch = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in asm.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.Namespace == deploymentNamespace && type.Name.Equals(controllerName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                deploymentMatch = type;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (type.Namespace == defaultNamespace && type.Name.Equals(controllerName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                defaultMatch = type;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return deploymentMatch ?? defaultMatch;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11993055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string BuildLists(List<KeyValuePair<string, int>> pairs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int CurrentLevel = 1;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder s = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    s.Append("<ul>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> pair in pairs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(pair.Value > CurrentLevel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Nest moreDi2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < pair.Value - CurrentLevel; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                s.Append("<li><ul>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(pair.Value < CurrentLevel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Close TagsDi2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < CurrentLevel - pair.Value; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                s.Append("</ul></li>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        s.Append("<li>" + pair.Key + "</li>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CurrentLevel = pair.ValueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Close everything.Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < CurrentLevel - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s.Append("</ul></li>");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    s.Append("</ul>");Di2015NewLine    return s.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11994427Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Saves a picture of the screen to a bitmap image.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The saved bitmap.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate Bitmap CaptureScreenShot()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the bounding area of the screen containing (0,0)Di2015NewLine    // remember in a multidisplay environment you don't know which display holds this pointDi2015NewLine    Rectangle bounds = Screen.GetBounds(Point.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create the bitmap to copy the screen shot toDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(bounds.Width, bounds.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now copy the screen image to the graphics device from the bitmapDi2015NewLine    using (Graphics gr = Graphics.FromImage(bitmap))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine           gr.CopyFromScreen(Point.Empty, Point.Empty, bounds.Size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return bitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11994543Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void DownloadFile(Uri address, string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var client = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = client.OpenRead(address))Di2015NewLine    using (var file = File.Create(filePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine        int bytesReceived;Di2015NewLine        while ((bytesReceived = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            file.Write(buffer, 0, bytesReceived);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11994614Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> GetContainsExpression<T>(string propertyName, string containsValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameterExp = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "type");Di2015NewLine    var propertyExp = Expression.Property(parameterExp, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains", new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLine    var someValue = Expression.Constant(propertyValue, typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    var containsMethodExp = Expression.Call(propertyExp, method, someValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(containsMethodExp, parameterExp);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression<Func<T, TKey>> GetPropertyExpression(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameterExp = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "type");Di2015NewLine    var exp = Expression.Property(parameterExp, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, TKey>>(exp, parameterExp);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11994614Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IQueryable<T> WhereStringContains<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string propertyName, string contains)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "type");Di2015NewLine        var propertyExpression = Expression.Property(parameter, propertyName);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method =
