Expression.Call(propertyExpression, method, someValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.Where(Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(containsExpression, parameter));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IOrderedQueryable<T> OrderBy<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyType = typeof(T).GetProperty(propertyName).PropertyType;Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "type");Di2015NewLine        var propertyExpression = Expression.Property(parameter, propertyName);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(propertyExpression, new[] { parameter });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                                .Where(m => m.Name == "OrderBy" && m.GetParameters().Length == 2)Di2015NewLine                                .Single()Di2015NewLine                                .MakeGenericMethod(new[] { typeof(T), propertyType })Di2015NewLine                                .Invoke(null, new object[] { query, lambda }) as IOrderedQueryable<T>;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IOrderedQueryable<T> OrderByDescending<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine .Single()Di2015NewLine                                .MakeGenericMethod(new[] { typeof(T), propertyType })Di2015NewLine                                .Invoke(null, new object[] { query, lambda }) as IOrderedQueryable<T>;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11994794Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SnippetTool.RepositoriesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class DefaultValidatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // whatever your "default" validation is, may just return true...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class ARepository<TProvider> : ARepository<TProvider, DefaultValidator>Di2015NewLine        where TProvider : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        protected ARepository(TProvider provider) : base(provider, new DefaultValidator());Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // needs no new logic, just any specialized constructors...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class ARepository<TProvider, TValidator> Di2015NewLine         where TProvider : class Di2015NewLine         where TValidator : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TValidator Validator { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected ARepository(TProvider provider, TValidator validator) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Provider = provider;Di2015NewLine            Validator = validator;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // all the logic goes here...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11996441Di2015UniqueSeparatorabstract class ExpanderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int ZIP_LEAD_BYTES = 0x04034b50;Di2015NewLine    private const ushort GZIP_LEAD_BYTES = 0x8b1f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract MemoryStream Expand(Stream stream); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static bool IsPkZipCompressedData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(data != null && data.Length >= 4);Di2015NewLine        // if the first 4 bytes of the array are the ZIP signature then it is compressed dataDi2015NewLine        return (BitConverter.ToInt32(data, 0) == ZIP_LEAD_BYTES);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static bool IsGZipCompressedData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(data != null && data.Length >= 2);Di2015NewLine        // if the first 2 bytes of the array are theG ZIP signature then it is compressed data;Di2015NewLine        return (BitConverter.ToUInt16(data, 0) == GZIP_LEAD_BYTES);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsCompressedData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IsPkZipCompressedData(data) || IsGZipCompressedData(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expander GetExpander(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(stream != null);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(stream.CanSeek);Di2015NewLine        stream.Seek(0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            stream.Read(bytes, 0, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (IsGZipCompressedData(bytes))Di2015NewLine                return new GZipExpander();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (IsPkZipCompressedData(bytes))Di2015NewLine                return new ZipExpander();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new NullExpander();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stream.Seek(0, 0);  // set the stream back to the beginingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12003183Di2015UniqueSeparator        // If there are mixed interval types in an input stringDi2015NewLine        string input = "10 days and 10 hours ago";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Parse out the intervals and numbersDi2015NewLine        var matches = Regex.Matches(input, Di2015NewLine                       @"(?<number>\\d+)\\s(?<interval>(day)|(minute)|(hour))");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert them to dictionaryDi2015NewLine        var dic = matchesDi2015NewLine            .Cast<Match>()Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine                key => key.Groups["interval"].Value, Di2015NewLine                o => int.Parse(o.Groups["number"].Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Calculate the total number of minutes for each intervalDi2015NewLine        DateTime result = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        int totalMinutes = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var keyValue in dic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             if (keyValue.Key.Contains("minute"))Di2015NewLine                 totalMinutes += keyValue.Value;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                 if (keyValue.Key.Contains("hour"))Di2015NewLine                    totalMinutes += keyValue.Value * 60;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                     if (keyValue.Key.Contains("day"))Di2015NewLine                        totalMinutes += keyValue.Value * 1440;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("Unparsable time format");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result = DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(-totalMinutes);Di2015NewLine

12007064Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace wbmp2pngDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string file in args)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!File.Exists(file))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                byte[] data = File.ReadAllBytes(file);Di2015NewLine                int width = 0;Di2015NewLine                int height = 0;Di2015NewLine                int i = 2;Di2015NewLine                for (; data[i] >> 7 == 1; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    width = (width << 7) | (data[i] & 0x7F);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                width = (width << 7) | (data[i++] & 0x7F);Di2015NewLine                for (; data[i] >> 7 == 1; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    height = (height << 7) | (data[i] & 0x7F);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                height = (height << 7) | (data[i++] & 0x7F);Di2015NewLine                int firstPixel = i;Di2015NewLine                Bitmap png = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLine                for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        png.SetPixel(x, y, (((data[firstPixel + (x / 8) + (y * ((width - 1) / 8 + 1))] >> (7 - (x % 8))) & 1) == 1) ? Color.White : Color.Black);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                png.Save(Path.ChangeExtension(file, "png"));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    public void StoreApplicationDocument(string applicationName, XmlReader document)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var connection = CreateConnection())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SqlCommand command = connection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText = "INSERT INTO ApplicationDocuments (ApplicationName, Document) VALUES SqlParameter("@document", new SqlXml(document)));Di2015NewLine                                                             //  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // reads an XML document from the 'ApplicationDocuments' table:Di2015NewLine    public XmlReader GetApplicationXslt(string applicationName)Di2015NewLine 12007336Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DynamicCollection<T> : IEnumerable, INotifyCollectionChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ICollectionView Collection { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public delegate List<T> Del();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Del query;Di2015NewLine    public Del QueryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return query;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (query != value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                query = value;//set the new queryDi2015NewLine                T currentItem = (T)Collection.CurrentItem;//save current itemDi2015NewLine                Collection = new PagedCollectionView(Query());//recreate collection with new queryDi2015NewLine                Collection.MoveCurrentTo(currentItem);//move current to the previous current (if it doesn't exist, nothing is selected)Di2015NewLine                OnCollectionChanged(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset));//Notify colleciton has changed.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicCollection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Collection = new PagedCollectionView(new List<T>());//empty collectionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicCollection(IEnumerable<T>collection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Collection = new PagedCollectionView(collection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicCollection(Del delegateQuery)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Query = delegateQuery;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IEnumerable MembersDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Collection.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregion IEnumerable MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region INotifyCollectionChanged MembersDi2015NewLine    public event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler 12009915Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine   /// An item was added.Di2015NewLine   /// </summary>Di2015NewLine   public override void ItemAdded(SPItemEventProperties properties)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       base.ItemAdded(properties);Di2015NewLine       SPListItem item = properties.ListItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (item["Name"] == null)Di2015NewLine           return; //or better yet, logDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       string oldFileName = item["Name"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       SPQuery query = BuildArbitraryQuery(properties.List, "Created By", properties.UserDisplayName, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int count = properties.List.GetItems(query).Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int positionOfPeriod = oldFileName.LastIndexOf(".");Di2015NewLine       if (positionOfPeriod == -1)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine            fileName = oldFileName;Di2015NewLine            fileExtension = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine       elseDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine             fileName = oldFileName.Substring(0, positionOfPeriod);Di2015NewLine             fileExtension = oldFileName.Substring(positionOfPeriod);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       string newFileName = fileName + "-xx" + count.ToString() + fileExtension;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       item["Name"] = newFileName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       tryDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           properties.Web.AllowUnsafeUpdates = true;Di2015NewLine           EventFiringEnabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           item.Update();Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       finallyDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           properties.Web.AllowUnsafeUpdates = false;Di2015NewLine           EventFiringEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   /// <summary>Di2015NewLine   /// Builds an arbitrary SPQuery which filters by a single column value.Di2015NewLine   /// </summary>Di2015NewLine   /// <param name="list">The list you will run the query against.</param>Di2015NewLine   /// <param name="columnDisplayName">The Display Name of the column you want to filter.</param>Di2015NewLine   /// <param name="value">The value to filter against.</param>Di2015NewLine   /// <returns>A new SPQuery object ready to run against the list.</returns>Di2015NewLine   public static SPQuery BuildArbitraryQuery(SPList list, string columnDisplayName, string value, bool deepSearch)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       if (list == null)Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentNullException("You cannot pass a null list to Helper.BuildArbitraryQuery.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (!list.Fields.ContainsField(columnDisplayName))Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentException("The SharePoint List \\"" + list.Title + "\\" does not contain the Field \\"" + columnDisplayName + "\\".");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       string internalName = list.Fields[columnDisplayName].InternalName;Di2015NewLine       SPQuery query = new SPQuery();Di2015NewLine       query.Query = "<Where><Eq><FieldRef Name=\\"" + internalName + "\\"/><Value Type=\\"Text\\">" + value + "</Value></Eq></Where>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (deepSearch)Di2015NewLine           query.ViewAttributes += "Scope='RecursiveAll'";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return query;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

12016864Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Bitmap ScaleImage(Image oldImage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double resizeFactor = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (oldImage.Width > 150 || oldImage.Height > 150)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double widthFactor = Convert.ToDouble(oldImage.Width) / 150;Di2015NewLine        double heightFactor = Convert.ToDouble(oldImage.Height) / 150;Di2015NewLine        resizeFactor = Math.Max(widthFactor, heightFactor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int width = Convert.ToInt32(oldImage.Width / resizeFactor);Di2015NewLine    int height = Convert.ToInt32(oldImage.Height / resizeFactor);Di2015NewLine    Bitmap newImage = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(newImage);Di2015NewLine    g.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine    g.DrawImage(oldImage, 0, 0, newImage.Width, newImage.Height);Di2015NewLine    return newImage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12022797Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string inp = "USD 1.23 1.12 1.42 EUR 0.2 0.3 0.42 JPY 1.2 1.42 1.53";Di2015NewLine    while(true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pos = IndexOfN(inp, " ", 4);Di2015NewLine        if(pos != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string part = inp.Substring(0, pos);Di2015NewLine            inp = inp.Substring(pos + 1);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(part);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(inp);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint IndexOfN(string input, string sep, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int pos = input.IndexOf(sep);Di2015NewLine    count--;Di2015NewLine    while(pos > -1 && count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pos = input.IndexOf(sep, pos+1);Di2015NewLine        count--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return pos ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12023228Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Tuple<T1, T2, T3> : IEquatable<Object>{Di2015NewLine    public T1 Item1{Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T2 Item2{Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T3 Item3{Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tuple(T1 Item1, T2 Item2, T3 Item3){Di2015NewLine         this.Item1 = Item1;Di2015NewLine         this.Item2 = Item2;Di2015NewLine         this.Item3 = Item3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals( object obj ) {Di2015NewLine        if ( obj == null || (obj as Tuple<T1, T2, T3>) == null ) //if the object is null or the cast failsDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            Tuple<T1,T2,T3> tuple = ( Tuple<T1, T2, T3> ) obj;Di2015NewLine            return Item1.Equals( tuple.Item1 ) && Item2.Equals(tuple.Item2) && Item3.Equals(tuple.Item3);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode( ) {Di2015NewLine        return Item1.GetHashCode( ) ^ Item2.GetHashCode() ^ Item3.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator == ( Tuple<T1, T2, T3> tuple1, Tuple<T1, T2, T3> tuple2 ) {Di2015NewLine        return tuple1.Equals( tuple2 );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator != ( Tuple<T1, T2, T3> tuple1, Tuple<T1, T2, T3> tuple2 ) {Di2015NewLine        return !tuple1.Equals( tuple2 );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12025348Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace MvcApplication.Infrastructure.DispatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine    using System.Globalization;Di2015NewLine    using System.Linq;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net.Http;Di2015NewLine    using System.Web.Http;Di2015NewLine    using System.Web.Http.Controllers;Di2015NewLine    using System.Web.Http.Dispatcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class AreaHttpControllerSelector : DefaultHttpControllerSelectorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const string AreaRouteVariableName = "area";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly HttpConfiguration _configuration;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Lazy<ConcurrentDictionary<string, Type>> _apiControllerTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AreaHttpControllerSelector(HttpConfiguration configuration)Di2015NewLine            : base(configuration)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _configuration = configuration;Di2015NewLine            _apiControllerTypes = new Lazy<ConcurrentDictionary<string, Type>>(GetControllerTypes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override HttpControllerDescriptor SelectController(HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.GetApiController(request);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string GetAreaName(HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var data = request.GetRouteData();Di2015NewLine            if (data.Route.DataTokens == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object areaName;Di2015NewLine                return data.Route.DataTokens.TryGetValue(AreaRouteVariableName, out areaName) ? areaName.ToString() : null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static ConcurrentDictionary<string, Type> GetControllerTypes()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var assemblies = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var types = assembliesDi2015NewLine                .SelectMany(a => aDi2015NewLine                    .GetTypes().Where(t =>Di2015NewLine                        !t.IsAbstract &&Di2015NewLine                        t.Name.EndsWith(ControllerSuffix, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) &&Di2015NewLine                        typeof(IHttpController).IsAssignableFrom(t)))Di2015NewLine                .ToDictionary(t => t.FullName, t => t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new ConcurrentDictionary<string, Type>(types);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private HttpControllerDescriptor GetApiController(HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var areaName = GetAreaName(request);Di2015NewLine            var controllerName = GetControllerName(request);Di2015NewLine            var type = GetControllerType(areaName, controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new HttpControllerDescriptor(_configuration, controllerName, type);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Type GetControllerType(string areaName, string controllerName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var query = _apiControllerTypes.Value.AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(areaName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                query = query.WithoutAreaName();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                query = query.ByAreaName(areaName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return queryDi2015NewLine                .ByControllerName(controllerName)Di2015NewLine                .Select(x => x.Value)Di2015NewLine                .Single();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ControllerTypeSpecificationsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, Type>> ByAreaName(this IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, Type>> query, string areaName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var areaNameToFind = string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, ".{0}.", areaName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return query.Where(x => x.Key.IndexOf(areaNameToFind, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) != -1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, Type>> WithoutAreaName(this IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, Type>> query)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return query.Where(x => x.Key.IndexOf(".areas.", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == -1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, Type>> ByControllerName(this IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, Type>> query, string controllerName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var controllerNameToFind = string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, ".{0}{1}", controllerName, AreaHttpControllerSelector.ControllerSuffix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return query.Where(x => x.Key.EndsWith(controllerNameToFind, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12025915Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Bitmap RotateImage( Bitmap bmp, float angle ) {Di2015NewLine     Bitmap rotatedImage = new Bitmap( bmp.Width, bmp.Height );Di2015NewLine     using ( Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage( rotatedImage ) ) {Di2015NewLine        g.TranslateTransform( bmp.Width / 2, bmp.Height / 2 ); //set the rotation point as the center into the matrixDi2015NewLine        g.RotateTransform( angle ); //rotateDi2015NewLine        g.TranslateTransform( -bmp.Width / 2, -bmp.Height / 2 ); //restore rotation point into the matrixDi2015NewLine        g.DrawImage( bmp, new Point( 0, 0 ) ); //draw the image on the new bitmapDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return rotatedImage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12026844Di2015UniqueSeparatorIt is useless code, that just creates clutter in your source code and it also confusing for the developer because you dont know which namespaces are actually used.Di2015NewLineOver time as your code changes it can accumulate a lot of unused using statements which create even more clutter in you code.Di2015NewLineIt can make your compiling faster, since compiler does not have to look up all those extra unused namespaces.Di2015NewLineIt will help avoid name conflict with new items that you going to add to your solution if both of those have same names.Di2015NewLineIt will reduce number of items in your Visual Studio editor auto completionDi2015NewLine

12030148Di2015UniqueSeparator// find the next non-zero byte (I'm assuming little endian) or return -1Di2015NewLineint find_next_byte(byte[] data, int i) {Di2015NewLine    while (data[i] == 0) --i;Di2015NewLine    return i;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// find a bit mask of the next non-zero bit or return 0Di2015NewLineint find_next_bit(int value, int b) {Di2015NewLine    while (b > 0 && ((value & b) == 0)) b >>= 1;Di2015NewLine    return b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint i = find_next_byte(data, data.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine// find the first 1 bitDi2015NewLineint b = find_next_bit(data[i], 1 << 7);Di2015NewLine// try to find the second 1 bitDi2015NewLineb = find_next_bit(data[i], b >> 1);Di2015NewLineif (b > 0) {Di2015NewLine    // found 2 bits, removing the restDi2015NewLine    if (b > 1) data[i] &= ~(b - 1);Di2015NewLine} else {Di2015NewLine    // we only found 1 bit, find the next non-zero byteDi2015NewLine    i = find_next_byte(data, i - 1);Di2015NewLine    b = find_next_bit(data[i], 1 << 7);Di2015NewLine    if (b > 1) data[i] &= ~(b - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// remove the rest (a memcpy would be even better here,Di2015NewLine// but that would probably require unmanaged code)Di2015NewLinefor (--i; i >= 0; --i) data[i] = 0;Di2015NewLine

12034362Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IObservable<int> CreateObservable()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<int>(o =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var subj = new Subject<int>();Di2015NewLine        var disposable = subj.Subscribe(o);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine        var maxValue = rnd.Next(20);Di2015NewLine        subj.OnNext(-1);Di2015NewLine        for(int iCounter = 0; iCounter < maxValue; iCounter++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            subj.OnNext(iCounter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        subj.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return disposable;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12040554Di2015UniqueSeparatorThe regular expression:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(?-imsx:^[a-z]+(?:[ -][a-z]+)*\\s+\\d+H\\s+[a-z]+\\s+\\d{2}-\\d{2}-\\d{4}\\.dwg$)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinematches as follows:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineNODE                     EXPLANATIONDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine(?-imsx:                 group, but do not capture (case-sensitive)Di2015NewLine                         (with ^ and $ matching normally) (with . notDi2015NewLine                         matching \\n) (matching whitespace and #Di2015NewLine                         normally):Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  ^                        the beginning of the stringDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  [a-z]+                   any character of: 'a' to 'z' (1 or moreDi2015NewLine                           times (matching the most amount possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  (?:                      group, but do not capture (0 or more timesDi2015NewLine                           (matching the most amount possible)):Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine    [ -]                     any character of: ' ', '-'Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine    [a-z]+                   any character of: 'a' to 'z' (1 or moreDi2015NewLine                             times (matching the most amountDi2015NewLine                             possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  )*                       end of groupingDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  \\s+                      whitespace (\\n, \\r, \\t, \\f, and " ") (1 orDi2015NewLine                           more times (matching the most amountDi2015NewLine                           possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  \\d+                      digits (0-9) (1 or more times (matchingDi2015NewLine                           the most amount possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  H                        'H'Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  \\s+                      whitespace (\\n, \\r, \\t, \\f, and " ") (1 orDi2015NewLine                           more times (matching the most amountDi2015NewLine                           possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  [a-z]+                   any character of: 'a' to 'z' (1 or moreDi2015NewLine                           times (matching the most amount possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  \\s+                      whitespace (\\n, \\r, \\t, \\f, and " ") (1 orDi2015NewLine 12041349Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DateTime NextDate {Di2015NewLine    get {Di2015NewLine        DateTime today = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLine        DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        int daysUntilWeekday = ((int)Day - (int)today.DayOfWeek + 7) % 7;Di2015NewLine        DateTime nextWeekDay = today.AddDays(daysUntilWeekday);Di2015NewLine        var nextTime = nextWeekDay.AddSeconds(Second).AddMinutes(Minute).AddHours(Hour);Di2015NewLine        if (nextTime < DateTime.Now) {Di2015NewLine            return nextTime.AddDays(7);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            return nextTime;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

12043837Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void X()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tiles = genworld();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < tiles.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int j = 0; j < tiles[i].Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(tiles[i][j]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int[][] genworld(int size = 25)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* the solution with the database "worked" because it was slow. Di2015NewLine       going in memory will cause this to run faster so you need toDi2015NewLine       declare a Random first and use it later.  this approach avoidsDi2015NewLine       a class-level variable.Di2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLine    var r = new Random();Di2015NewLine    Func<int, int, int> gentile = (grass, desert) =>Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            var number = r.Next(1, grass + desert);Di2015NewLine                                            return number < desert ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine                                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tiles = new int[size][];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tiles[i] = new int[size];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var row = 0; row < size; row++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var col = 0; col < size; col++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int tileabove = 9999;Di2015NewLine            int tilenextto = 9999;Di2015NewLine            int tile = 9999;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (row >= 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tileabove = tiles[row - 1][col];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (col >= 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tilenextto = tiles[row][col - 1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (tile == 9999 && (tileabove == 9999 || tilenextto == 9999))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tile = gentile(10, 10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (tile == 9999 && tileabove == 0 && tilenextto == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tile = gentile(200, 10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (tile == 9999 && tileabove == 1 && tilenextto == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tile = gentile(10, 200);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (tile == 9999 && tileabove == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tile = gentile(10, 10000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (tile == 9999 && (tileabove == 1 || tilenextto == 1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tile = gentile(20, 80);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tiles[row][col] = tile;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tiles;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
